title: Clean hotel and about 10 minutes by tram to main marina/harbour.
review: Very clean hotel Location near San Juan beach Rooms lovely House cleaning service excellent Staff at restaurant could be more welcoming. Choices of food limited and was cold, however, there was good selection of fruits Staff offered me wine glass to drink larger on 2 different days. That was unusual. I would have given 4 stars if not for the experience at the restaurant.

title: Short break
review: Dear Mr. 435iglo,  We really want to thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  We are pleased to hear from you that you enjoyed your stay, however, we regret that we didn’t live up to your expectation regading restaurant service. This is definitely not the image we want our guests and customers to take with us.  We will take your comments on board to improve all those points that should be taken into account and we hope you give us another opportunity the next time you are in the city.  Kind regards,

title: San Juan experiince
review: The new owners have definitely been improving some of the rooms and reception areas. The pool area is much better and cleaner and the hotel is the busiest I’ve ever seen it but still great value. Mostly the same staff so I guess they are doing something right.  Great location 5 mins walk from Avenido d’Naciones tram station.

title: Theresa
review: Dear Mr. Adrianlind,  Many thanks for your comment and punctuation, and for recommend our hotel with your kind words.  We are pleased to hear form you that you enjoyed you recent stay stay. For us, was a pleasure served to you and we really would like to receive you again very soon.  Best regards.

title: Not quite good enough for the price
review: stayed here for a week in September with my wife on a bed and breakfast basis just arrived after all the bad weather hotel was ok breakfast was only ok i have had better . the staff were ok some had very poor english .A lovely beach a very rude waiter in one of the restaurants on the beach .this area is built for spanish tourists and i got the feeling they didnnt realy want us there if you cannot speek fluent spanish stay away .i wont be back . i almost forgot the pool area of the hotel was alive with ants

title: We absolutely love this hotel!
review: We have stayed at this hotel many times & wholeheartedly recommend it! The beach is just down the road so I’m not sure why anybody would need the pool too much. The staff are friendly and seem to have been around for a while (surely a good sign). We have stayed in 5 star hotels before but I think this is our favourite hotel. The cleanliness of the hotel & professionalism of the staff are “second to none” Book this hotel - you will not be disappointed!

title: Super Hotel 🏨
review: Dear Alberto F,  First of all, many thanks for your excellent comment and punctuation, and for staying with us one more time.   We are delighted to have attended you during your recent stay and we are glad to know that you have enjoyed a pleasant stay.  A positive customer experience is something that our staff takes pride in and we hope to receive you again very soon.   Thanks again & best regards.

title: A great stay at a friendly hotel.
review: Second stay in this hotel, our previous stay was when it was the Holiday Inn. The rooms are in the process of being updated and we stayed in one of the new rooms. The room was lovely, spotlessly clean, lovely bathroom, super air conditioning. The food was lovely, lovely staff, great pool area, will definitely return 😊.

title: Nice hotel and friendly staff
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your excellent comment and score. We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us and we thank you for highlighting the aspects that you liked most about your stay with us.  We hope to see you again very soon.  Best regards.

title: Not 4 Star Quality
review: This is probably the most I have ever written about a hotel! This hotel is very nice indeed, the staff are so friendly and helpful, nothing is too much trouble. They work extremely hard to make your stay special, continually cleaning up and and maintaining the hotel. All areas are spotless. Our room was spotless. The buffet food is easily the best I have ever tasted, obvious care and skilled cooking makes all the dishes first class and very tasty. The chef and assistants continually bring new dishes not just more of the same. Every day had new and different things to eat. No shop in the hotel but a supermarket very short walk away so no problems there. Just an observation, the hotel location was fairly high up a hill, so walking to the beach and restaurants was not too bad but…

title: We enjoyed our vacation
review: It´s a quiet place where you are able to relax, not far to the city center and easy to get around by car. The staff are great, kind, helpfull and they do their very best with the language too :-)  The rooms could be upgrated and the pool water was cold - in general, it was a good  Desfrutamos nuestros vacationes y muchas gracias a todos

title: Good for one night
review: Dear Robert,  First of all, many thanks for your review.   We are pleased to hear from you that you enjoyed your stay with us.   We hope to see you again soon!  Best resgards.

title: I had anticipated more, but received much,  much less than the minimal of lowest standards!!
review: First room on second floor 113 it was ants everywhere. Change to 1 floor number 13. It was better but ants in bathroom.  No good.. I got full board for 2 days. Breakfast wasnt good. Lunchtime ok, but dinner had leftovers from lunch. And desame all time.  The pool was very good. The gym👍And free parking. Have a mercadon next door.

title: Good hotel
review: Dear Bodaasa,  Many thanks for your comment. We are pleased to hear from you that you enjoyed the pool area and gym facilities. As you have commented, we are next to the supermarket.  I am so sorry for the inconveniences caused during your stay regarding ants and food service. We are looking into this matters in order to resolve them.   We hope to have the oportunity of receive you again to give you a best experience.  Regards.

title: Avoid the food
review: I am just after spending a week here with my future wife, so let me first of all let me say the few good points of our stay at this hotel. The hotel itself is just a short walk away from the beach and there is also a few local pubs that are very good, the main one being, 'Sparks Bar Elpaso', which we found the staff and customers to be second to none!!. To come to the hotel itself, the rooms themselves where of a neat and clean appearance and where fully cleaned every day. There was a well presented buffet breakfast with a wide range of fresh fruit etc.   Now to the negatives regarding this establishment, of which there is many...... On arrival, the receptionist could not speak English, and for a hotel which was flying a Union flag,was a bit disappointing. The kids ran around…

title: Ok. But nothing much in the area.
review: We stayed for 4 nights at the end of march. The hotel is in an area on the outskirts of Alicante. Personally I found it to be a bit remote. The beach is about 10 mins walk away and is nice. There is a supermarket close by and some restaurants . Also a Macdonald's. Most of these are approximately 10-15 mins walk away. The tram runs into Alicante city centre.  Taxi from the airport cost us €38. To return to the airport we got the 21 bus just outside the hotel in to the marina area near the meila hotel, and then caught the c6 bus to the airport.   The hotel itself is fine. Nothing special. The lift is a bit away from the reception area.  The room was good, bed was comfortable and it had a fridge. Cleaning staff were very good.  Breakfast was average but adequate. Lots of fruit, and…

title: Fine for a couple of days
review: Dear Norfab,  Thank you very much for your candid review and for staying with us. We are happy to know that you liked our hotel and we certainly appreciate your nice feedback on our rooms and cleaning staff. However, we regret that the area has not been to your liking.  Many thanks again for your time.   Regards.

title: First time we have visited since change of ownership,  Well impressed
review: Room was large and clean although it was quite sparse in terms of decor. We were room only so decided to eat out so cannot comment in the food. It is a good location for access to the beach - the beach area was lovely. The area around the hotel is mainly residential (large tower blocks so not aesthetically pleasing but as a base, the hotel does a good job). Check in was quick and the sauna/fitness room looked very well kept and had some good pieces of gym equipment. Overall a fairly good place to stay.

title: Great Hotel, Bad timing
review: The society we belong to have an annual meeting in December every year & for the last 4 years has used this venue.   It has had a change of ownership &  they are doing a lot of work to upgrade the hotel.  Rooms are being refurbished and the room we had was excellent.  The restaurant has changed its menu  ( 3 courses for 10 Euros) & the food we ate on the Friday night was fresh & tasty.  It is an ideal location for the beach & travelling into Alicante City

title: The hotel is ok, but don't visit this part of Alicante
review: Good Morning Gi m,  We appreciate your excellent evaluation and comment. It´s gratifying to read that our efforts to improve our facilities and service to our customers are rewarded.  We hope to welcome you again next year and offer you a more satisfying experience.  Thank you very much  Kind Regards

title: Very basic
review: ..and in some areas the carpets were worn and the hallways smelt faintly musty.  The bar staff were not as friendly as we had hoped, in fact one in particular was quite indifferent and could not even be bothered to raise a smile!  Sadly she was also employed in the restaurant.

title: Not great.
review: Good afternoon SanMadg,   We inform you that at this time, we are renovating and improving ours facilities to offer a better service to our guests. Wo would like you to come again and you will apreciate our changes.  Thank you very much

title: Sterile and tired
review: I found the staff that I encountered in this hotel to not be very helpful. The food was not nice and the food in surrounding restaurants wasn’t great either, although there wasn’t a big selection. The location is okay if you are happy to lie on the beach all day as their isn’t many activities. My partner and I went jet skiing about half an hour away which was probably the highlight of our trip and also took the tram to Benidorm for the day which was a better location. I would consider booking a different hotel if you’re playing on going to Alicante.

title: Positives and Negatives
review: Good afternoon Bethanymags,  We regret that our hotel has not met your expectations.  We inform you that we are currently immersed in a series of reforms to improve and renew our facilities.  We hope you can give us a second chance to offer you a pleasant experience.  Thank you very much for your comment  Kind regards

title: Worse food ever!!
review: Had to stay here on a business trip and it really isn't suitable for that. Room was very sterile looking and just not nice, WiFi didn't work properly as I couldn't get devices to connect, not a problem for me in most hotels. The worst of it was that breakfast doesn't start till seven thirty which is no good when you need an early start. I won't be using this hotel again.

title: We’ve already booked again for next year!!
review: We have stopped in the hotel both when it was a Holiday Inn & now it’s a Port Hotel. Over the last 10 years we must have stopped in excess of 150 nights so I think we’re in a position to offer an authoritative review.  Staff All the staff are friendly and we have never experienced any “rudeness” EVER. It’s true many of them don’t speak English that well. Try speaking a little Spanish - They are very patient & really appreciate your efforts. We keep recognising the same staff over the years - They are always friendly and always make us feel welcome.  Refurbishment The hotel appears to currently “under refurbishment”. The older rooms are absolutely fine. They certainly all have a new TV and they have reinstated the fridges. The WiFi seems to be better now also. I’m sure it’s only…

title: Rude staff
review: Good afternoon Alberto F,   Your comment has impacted us in a very positive way. We are happy to hear that your experience in our hotel after 10 years, is still satisfactory in all aspects.  As you well know, nowadays the name of our hotel is Port Alicante. The hotel is currently under renovation, with the idea of improving and modernizing our facilities so that our clients have more satisfactory experiences.  We are happy to know your nice opinion about our staff.  We try every day to improve and offer a great service to our customers.  We hope to see you again next year.  Thank you very much

title: Canceled
review: Myself and my partner stayed in this hotel end of August start of September. Firstly I want to start with the positives, the pool area is really lovely and the lifeguard is very friendly also, the rooms, despite being outdated (see more below) are absolutely spotless. Could not commend the cleaners enough they do excellent work. The breakfast was sufficient had a nice variety to choose from which meant you could fill up for the day ahead.   Now for the negatives. The first being the staff, it seemed the majority of people who stay at this hotel are Spanish families because very few staff, bar one or two on reception spoke any English. We tried our best with this but it’s not a language one can master over a few days! We felt like we were for the most part an absolute…

title: Great Hotel
review: Good afternoon David F,  We are pleased with your news about our pool area, lifeguard, rooms and breakfast.  We are sorry if the friendliness of our staff has not been to your liking and the rest of aspects of the hotel has not met your expectations. We try to be friendly with all our customers.  We receive many foreign clients and that is why our reception staff speaks English and they usually help in the restaurant if there is a communication problem.  Our daily menu has a closed price of 10 eur including starters, main course and dessert, even if you only want to take the starters.  It is my duty to inform you that it is not possible to book a double bed room before arrival at the hotel, it depends on availability upon arrival. If the day of arrival there wasn´t availability, that is why you were changed the day after if availability allowed, but the type of bed is never guaranteed before arrival.  I inform you that right now the hotel is in the process of renovation, which we hope will be of your pleasure if you give us another opportunity to try to improve your experience with us.  Sorry for the inconveniences and once again, thanks for your comment.  Kins Regards

title: Unsatisfied. Low quality for price payd
review: We didnt stay in this hotel , just checked in look at the most outdated room I have every saw and left with a full refund.  As it turns out the only new rooms are family rooms,,, so be warned. The area is quiet and the beach is at least 10 mins walk( a lovely beach).  There are no bars or other hotels that we saw. We got the tram into Alicante and stayed in a lovely hotel.  Its a shame as the staff were lovely and totally understood. The pool from what I saw was small and overrun with children.

title: Lovely stat May 2018
review: We had a lovely stay for 1 week in May. Really nice newly refurbished room, lovely pool area, spotlessly clean and helpful staff. Good location 10 minutes from beautiful San Juan beach, 5 minutes to supermarket and tram stop. It is only 1.45 to alicante by tram. We akso travelled to nearly town El Campello and to benidrom to visit Mundomar marine park by tram, which we lovely. San Juan itself is a safe quite area with mainlu spanish visitors with a small but nice selection of restaurants and bars along with the lovely white sand beach. We thought the hotel was very reasonably priced.

title: Seasoned traveller with accurate review
review: Hello Leona,  Many thanks for your candid review.  We are pleased to hear that you liked room, pool area and staff. Also, we are located in a nice area. So, we are happy that you are very satisfied with your stay.  We hope to see you soon. Regards.

title: Easyjet cancellation
review: Currently staying at this hotel let me start with negatives in my opinion that i have and that is no kettle in room so you can leave tea bags at home and no balcony to sit out on. On plus  side staff very efficient  Room 207 beautifully furnished and lovely toiletries in bathroom even a comb. Food in dining room is fine for 10 euro starter main and dessert not Michelin standards but really what do you expect. I cannot  understand the poor reviews i definitely would return. Within a ten minute walk you are on the most spectacular prom spotlessly clean with numerous restaurant. Several places offer  beer/soft drink plus tapas for 2 euro. Very satisfied first time visitors.

title: Ok hotel
review: Dear Dolores M.  Thank you for your comment and punctuation regarding your stay.  We would like to apologise for the inconvenience caused about no balcony and kettle at your room. If you need boiled water or tea, you could ask for it at the bar.  On the other hand, we are pleased to hear that you liked room, staff and food. Also, we are located in a nice area, with lots of shops, bars and a beautiful beach. So, we are happy that you are very satisfied with your stay.  We hope to see you soon. Regards.

title: No no
review: We were taken here by Easyjet after a flight cancellation. Where do I start with this? Well,  I'm a severely disabled traveller and their accessible room was the best I've ever seen so I was quietly optimistic  about the hotel. This all went downhill once I realised we where in the middle of nowhere. This is in a residential area with literally nowhere to go. Then we move onto the food. This is absolutely appalling food. I don't know who the chef thinks he is but he is bringing some unbelievable concoctions together. Then we move on to the staff and this does not include the cleaners.  Extremely horrible arrogant nasty people who made me and my family feel like second rate citizens because we were English and not Spanish. Laura and Domingo in the restaurant made  it quite…

title: Good
review: Booked this hotel last minute. The hotel is a 10 minute walk from the beach which is Lovely. The staff at the hotel were helpful and friendly. The rooms were spacious and clean. We had breakfast once and it was fine, continental style breakfast. Cannot fault the hotel & staff. It was out if season so we found it difficult to find restaurants to eat but there seemed to be many there that were closed so I'm sure this wouldn't be an issue in the summer. Alicante city is only a short taxi drive away with many restaurants. Would definitely stay here again for a short break.

title: This is completely horrendous
review: The hotel is supposed to be a five star hotel. It is definitely not! Worn down and shabby, the breakfast is boring and the staff is completely clueless. Asked them to restart the router and they had NO clue!

title: Annual Meeting
review: Hi Lena R!   Thanks for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience1 I'm very sorry about the issues on our update, breakfast, and hotel staff's service. This is certainly not what our hotel strives for, nor is this our usual or our best. I reached out to you privately to discuss this further, and I look forward to your reply.  Once again, thanks for your feedback, and I hope we have the opportunity to show you an experience that aligns with the many 5-star reviews we receive every week.  Safe travels,   Gian M Case Manager IHGService

title: Nice location
review: We appreciate that this hotel is moving to a different chain of hotels in early 2018 but felt that the attitude of the staff and the overall appearance of the hotel was lacking.  We have visited this hotel once a year for the last 4 years.

title: 3 day break
review: Hello Gi m,  Thank you for staying with us and for leaving a review. I am happy that you are a regular here in the last 4 years. Please accept our sincerest apologies if we failed to make your stay more comfortable due to the condition of the hotel and the level of service. Your comments are highly valuable to us and will assist us in our continuous efforts to maintain and improve the service level we aim for. We are confident that necessary steps will be made, in order to achieve complete guest satisfaction.    Again, thank you for staying and we hope you give us another chance to show you how great our hotel is.    Best Regards,   John O  Case Manager  IHGService

title: Beach week with caz and Nic
review: Me and naldo, caz and Nic booked a last minute beach break to San Juan playa and stayed at the Holiday inn. I would like to say a big thank you to Maria jòse in the hotel bar, great service, also a big thank you to the cleaning staff , our rooms were cleaned to perfection, however, I would not return , the hotel was tired, lacked charm, expensive but average breakfast buffet. If you do stay in this hotel don't book or take a room between 118 & around 129/30 these rooms overlook the service area, deliveries, refuse collection ect, on the other hand the terrace closes at 22.00 due to the fact that the rooms overlooking the pool bar area don't want any noisy guests disturbing them, understandably so, but in Spain most people are still eating dinner at this time, so slight conflict…

title: Don't believe the bad reviews
review: Dear nicholasandronald,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and reviewing our property. I am very pleased to know you liked the convenient location of our hotel in the area and the service you received from our staff. On the other hand, I am sorry you were not well satisfied with the condition of our facility and the discomfort you had due to the noise. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. Your review will be used to consider improvements needed and we hope that you can give us a chance to show what we have done.  Thank you for staying and we hope you give us another chance to show you how great our hotel is.  Sincerely,  Anthony M Case Manager IHGService

title: This hotel is so Perfect
review: We stayed here for 9 night and never had a problem with anything.. We arrived at 12 at night and the receptionist was happy enough when booking us in.. Room as clean enough, we did ask for a double but we were expecting 2 singles pushed together.. Seems to b a standard thing now a days.. Towels changed daily.. Bed re made, bin emptyed everyday.. Cleaners always spoke on the passing.. Drinks fairly priced in bar, considering how much they pour you.. I was happy enough. We ate dinner 1 nite in hotel, fairly enjoyed it.. Also had lunch 1 day too.that was also great. Pool area is fine.. Not to busy and always a sun bed to be found.. Rooms are a bit dated, could do with a lick of paint and also carpets on corridor had a few stains. But so what, your not there to admire the walls or…

title: Tired but close to beach
review: I am stayin as we speak now for 2 days(room 138) with a view over the swimmingpool and I cant say anyting bad about this Hotel( the outdoor place is perfect, The Staff is so kind and welcoming, spcecially the Staff at the bar/ restraurant, they just welcome you as a family, the room is big and clean, the only thing it might be an little frigde( if you are gonna stay for a week or so, but that did not affect my staying for theese 2 days, the locations is 100 procent brilliant, 10 min walk to the beach and Shops everywhere, I dont understand the complains here on the Tripadvisor because this is so good Hotel, I am giving them Full house and coming back for longer time🤗🤗🤗

title: Fantastic stay
review: Never stayed at a Holiday Inn that needs upgrades more than this.  Great location not far from the beach but when we asked at the desk, was told it's 25 minutes away by bus ( 0 minute walk). They put us in a room over the entrance so all night long we heard the door open and close   Pool area was loud with no waiters working the area

title: Lovely area will stay there again
review: We needed a hotel that offered free parking and was reasonably priced and this hotel fitted the bill. It's classed as a 4 star hotel as there are business facilities, a restaurant and a decent pool but there was no fridge or tea/coffee making facilities so bring your own kettle! Lovely neighbourhood and nice and quiet with an easy stroll to the beach where there are bars and restaurants and a McDonalds.  The rooms are very large and spacious and the large bath was most welcome. Sachets of shower gel and shampoo are provided plus extra attached to the wall.  The staff are friendly and helpful and speak good english. If you have forgotten anything such as a toothbrush they will provide one for free.  The pool is nice and the enormous bed was very very comfortable Felt very safe…

title: Need upgraded
review: The hotel looks nice from the outside but it definitely wasn't when we walked in. Definitely not a 4*. The reception is basic. The carpets old, the walls grabby, the rooms although clean, were very old and basic. Wallpaper peeling off the walls, ceiling fracked and stained, no mini fridge, no safe and old furniture. The bathroom had broken tiles and grout, the chrome taps were old and not longer shiny , the shower head was spraying water in all direction, the soap dispenser on wall was odd. We were there for a night only while driving somewhere else along the coast, the night staff were non interested either.  The room was in a basement and I had to listen during the whole night the air condition engines outside the back of the hotel every 5 minutes for about 10 seconds, the…

title: Holiday Inn San Juan
review: Hi FAITHGLASGOW,  Thanks for sharing your thoughts and for choosing us for your lodging needs. Although it's nice that our exterior is to your liking, I'm sorry to hear that our accommodations did not meet your expectations. The overall upkeep, noise, and the staff's service level as detailed in your review is not the impression we'd like to leave any of our guests. Your feedback is appreciated and be assured that this has been shared with the team to ensure that we are on par.  Thanks again for bringing these to attention. Despite what transpired, I hope we get to welcome you back soon for a chance to make your next overnight better than the last.  Safe travels,  Jillian I Case Manager IHGService

title: Disappointing first night, but slowly redeemed itself
review: Lovely pool area lots of sun beds, although towels were put out and then left for hours. No outdoor pool bar while we were there. Internet was hit and miss. Breakfast was very good and lots of choice, hot and cold. Hotel was very clean and comfy beds. Supermarket close by and loads of eateries, so we did not eat here at night. 10 min walk to a fab beach very clean. Tram stop close to hotel too. We all enjoyed our 3 night stay and would come back again.

title: The Holiday Inn with so much potential but lacks investment.
review: Upon arriving at the hotel we were told that there were no working lifts and weren’t offered any help from staff. The corridor leading to our room was unlit and we were made to feel like we’d been shoved in an empty part of the hotel. The room itself was spacious and nicely decorated, with plenty of storage. Much to our surprise the water ran yellow when we turned on the taps. We told reception, they were previously aware of the situation but failed to tell us about before our arrival. They didn’t offer us another room to shower after a long day of traveling. But simply showed us to a sink downstairs where we could brush our teeth. The situation the following day was much better, despite this I feel like we shouldn’t have had to pay for a room that wasn’t up to the expected…

title: Not 4*
review: Booked in with my daughter on the 20th . Arrived late at night and the 2 reception ladies miserable.   The room was better than other reviews however massive dent on the bath and very rusty.  If you caught yourself on this you would need antibiotics and a tetanus jab .  The breakfast for the hot food chopped up hot dog sausages and cold bacon  . For a 4 star I find this shocking .  Would be nice if your maids would knock on before they actualy walked in .  The last morning my taxi was collecting us at 8am . The breakfast was running ten mins late then she tried charging us for breakfast when I had already paid in advance . Had less than 15 mins to eat breakfast.   The only positive about this hotel is the location.   Would I stay again? Absolutely not !!

title: Dated and past its best
review: Hello michelle s,  Thank you for taking time to share your experience with us. I am happy that our location worked for your travel needs. However, I am sorry to hear that you did not fully enjoy your time in our hotel. We take comments such as these seriously and would like to follow up with you. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain more information.      I look forward to hearing back from you very soon.    Best Regards,    John O  Case Manager  IHGService

title: Outdated
review: Although this hotel is in a great location it is now showing it's age.  Breakfast was fine and staff were friendly enough but this is NOT a 4 star hotel any more.  We stayed last year and came back again this year in the hope that some improvements had been made but no, it was worse. Only one socket in the room and no tea/coffee making facilities.  Sorry guys but we will be looking elsewhere from now on.

title: Late summer holiday in Alicante, Spain
review: Hello John H,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at Holiday Inn Alicante - Playa de San Juan, Spain. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We appreciate that you find our location to be convenient and your nice comment about breakfast.  However, on behalf of the hotel, I'm sorry we fell below your expectation regarding the room condition and the property being dated. We will look into these concerns. We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.    Sincerely,    Orlando   Case Manager  IHGService

title: Tired old hotel, surly service
review: As this hotel is for sale , maintenance is not a priority anymore. Carpets don’t look new  bathrooms could use updates , however rooms were kept very clean. Breakfast in the room was at a different price  than advertised, but got adjusted when we complained about it. If you didn’t want the full  buffet breakfast  an option was promoted to get a coffee and a bun at a the bar for a small fee, however, this option,turned out, was not for the summer months, and we only found out afterwards

title: Great location and restful stay
review: Very nice, reasonably priced hotel.  Nice big room in the tower.  Beds were pretty new and mattresses very firm.... could do with a mattress topper.  Pool area relaxed and great pool bar.  Staff very friendly.

title: August vacation at Playa San Juan
review: Dear Loll. Thank you very much for your candid review and for staying with us. We appreciate your positive feedback. I am pleased to hear from you that your stay was nice, specially that you enjoyed with our staff and pool areas. Thanks again and I look forward to see you soon. Regards.

title: Should not be a 4star hotel
review: This hotel is fine but I can maybe understand why people complain. Much will depend on which room you get. I think the worst ones are on the ground floor between reception and the lift. These are the ones with the old style TV’s and there will be people walking past all the time so they certainly won’t be calm. At peak times, like breakfast it must be a real pain.   Try and get a room on the higher floors.   Talking about breakfast, this is probably the worst aspect of this hotel. Not the food, it’s great, but the long wait each morning trying to get into the restaurant. There’s not enough space for everyone and this results in a wait for tables to become available. Once you’re eventually seated, there will be another long queue to toast your bread and the chances are there will…

title: Very welcoming.
review: Dear davewG6580TQ. Thank you for your candid review and for staying with us. We appreciate all feedback, both positive and constructive. I'm sorry to see that your stay had been less than ideal due to the hotel conditions and breakfast queue, which were below your expectations. I apologize for your disappointment and for any inconvenience this may have caused you. I would like to inform you that we will began with a remodelation soon so, we would love nothing more than to welcome you back and deliver an experience you'll be sure to remember. Regards.

title: Mixed feelings
review: Pretty dated hotel, mould on walls, I haven't seen a TV like this for almost 15years and only 6 channels work. And they call this a 4 star hotel has more in common with a Spanish pension. 10 min walk to the beach, staff pleasant and let down by the building. I would say not worth the money the 3stars near hear beat it hands down.

title: Hotel near to beach
review: Hotel is in good condition. Cleaning room service were working fine. Breakfast menu was excellent. Service at hotel restaurant was excellent and friendly. Reception service is good. Could be little more informative about links for public transports as local people can't speak much English but helpful and friendly. Bus goes to Alicante city from next to hotel and you can take another bus from Alicante city to Airport or vice a versa. Walking distance to beach in San Juan. Clean and log beach. Nice and not expensive, some cheap small restaurants next to beach. Even nice for evening walking or jogging.

title: Short holiday with my family
review: Dear Mahesh P. Thank you for your booking at Holiday Inn Alicante – Playa de San Juan and thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are happy to know that you liked our location, staff, food and services. We find fulfillment in meeting our guests' needs. Thanks again and I look forward to hear from you! Regards.

title: Would everybody please chill about this place - can't understand so many negative reviews!
review: If you have a family with more than four members then make sure to arrange a minibus to pick you up as taxis only take a minimum of four passengers per vehicle! Unlucky for me our transfer bus was cancelled at the last minute so had to get two taxis.Hotel reception welcomed us nicely regarding the time, brilliant night staff on duty went out of their ways to help over our stay! Breakfast buffet also brilliant variety to choose from. We all loved the hotel pool aswel, nice atmosphere. Local kebab house (Fontana kebab and pizza) saved our life as it was the only HALAL eatery in the area! Visited twice a day even tho there was plenty of supermarkets LOL.Beach was approximately 10 minute walk from the hotel and I was impressed how nice it was!Hotel rooms were a bit outdated but hey…

title: Drive home
review: Dear Jia U. Thank you very much for your candid review and for staying with us. We appreciate all feedback, both positive and constructive. I am pleased to hear from you that your stay was nice, specially that you enjoyed with our staff, food, and pool area. We hope begin with a reform soon to improve our facilities, so we hope to see you again soon. Regards.

title: Great stay
review: Stayed here three nights at the end of July with partner and our two children.The holiday Inn Playa San Juan is a 70's beach hotel that could do with a facelift, carpets in common areas are really worn and the pastel tones are a bit Falcon Crest. Front desk staff could smile a bit more and they should put fridges in rooms. Having no one to help you with whole family luggage and be told to get the trolley and suit yourself when there are 4 people behind the desk is simply not acceptable in a four star property.Dismal music selection on repeat at the pool.That's it. This is were negatives stop. I just can't understand some people's comments; have you not seen the pictures before booking? Have you looked at your bill? Seriously, were you expecting the St. Regis?  Now with the…

title: Shocked......
review: Currently staying in our 4th Hotel in the last 5 days of 6 night property search fact find and have stayed in 1x2star, 1x3star and this is our 2nd 4 star, however this should not be as the room is poor with a TV from the 80's a light connected to the mains and exposed, zero toiletries in the room but a lovely little note telling me to ask for some if I want them. A shower/bath mixer that throws the water out of both and neither can be turned off. We are on the 1st floor and when we finally left the room for evening meal my wife nearly wiped herself out when she tripped on an uneven floor with loose carpet tiles. Evening meal for two took approx 20 minutes to complete as after we had our starter the main came as clearing the first and the desert came while the boss had her main…

title: Mrs Jane Bryenton
review: Dear Mark M. Thank you for your booking at Holiday Inn Alicante – Playa de San Juan and please accept our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you have experienced during your stay due to the hotel conditions and service offered.  It is our goal to consistently provide superior service and accommodations at our hotel and your comments are very important to us. I would like to inform you that we will began with a remodelation soon so, we do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.

title: Good value and relaxing
review: This is my fourth visit to the holiday Inn. I love the area . I have found all the staff excellent & very friendly on all my visits . The restaurant is excellent for breakfast & dinner . Lovely pool (although a little busy in school hols)with a lifeguard present ! I do feel however that you need more sunbeds & also where are the cushions (the sunbeds were not very comfortable)I decided to go & sit on the beach which was  cooler plus charged 12euros for 2 beds & an umbrella. The rooms are lovely I stayed in 144 overlooking the pool but would benefit from coffee making facilities plus a fridge (but this would put the price up ) The televisions are dated but who watches tele on hols . This is a lovely hotel with great staff . Needs a bit updating but it would then be more expensive…

title: We liked it
review: Dear Mrs. Jane Bryeton. Thank you very much for your candid review and for staying with us. We appreciate all feedback, both positive and constructive. I am pleased to hear from you that your stay was excellent, specially that you enjoyed with our staff, food, pool and rooms. We hope begin with a reform soon to improve our facilities. See you on March dear friend! Regards.

title: Nice and Clean Hotel
review: Hotel is situated in a residential area about a 10 minute walk from the sea front. Younger couples may want a location that has more night life and bars. Rooms are a bit dated, however they are clean and have all you require. They will also provide items of toiletries if you have forgotten to pack them. TV's are old and there are no fridges in the rooms. There is air conditioning and Wifi, although it will not connect in the rooms, you have to go to the reception areas. Breakfast buffet is good, plenty of choice and continually topped up till end of service. Staff are effiecent if somewhat lacking in charisma. Pool area is good and not too busy, wish they would get some more music tapes as they played the same ones continually all day EVERY day.Alliin all good value and…

title: Rather tired but fairly comfortable hotel
review: The hotel has lots of resources like business meeting rooms and indoor fitness and health facilities and the staff are very accommodating but the hotel needs some updating: e.g. New carpets in common places and bathroom and bed renewals.  The menu is very limited and breakfasts are standard.   There is not a great choice of eateries around and about but buses to Alicante are frequent and bus stops are a short walk from the hotel.  A golf course is not far away.  The beach, a 10-15 minute walk away is lovely but many of the bars and cafe's restaurants along the sea front are not that inviting, Fast food is common and the quality of food available locally is nothing to shout about

title: Quick break
review: Hi Margaret J,  Thank you for your candid review, highlighting not only the bad but also the good points of your stay. We are always grateful when a guest takes the time and effort to acknowledge our staff. I am delighted to hear you found our location convenient and our hotel comfortable. title: Overall a good hotel, but with a serious need of some tech updating
review: Staff rude and unhelpful especially on reception,Bar staff nowhere to be seen,Housekeeping very good as was the pool bar lady and the lifeguard,Beach lovely but restaurants pricey for portion size,Drinks prices reasonable.Would not go back to this hotel or area again.

title: Little Gem of a Place
review: Hi lellie251,  Thank you for your candid review and for staying with us. We appreciate all feedback, both positive and constructive. I'm sorry to see that your stay had been less than ideal due to the service you received from some of our staff, which were below your expectations. I apologize for your disappointment and for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Please be assured that your feedback will be forwarded to the management team to ensure our valued guests' needs and expectations are met in the future. Should your travels bring you back to the area, we would love nothing more than to welcome you back and deliver an experience you'll be sure to remember.   Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGService

title: Good location but in need of some renovation.
review: Enjoyed my stay.. it was nice, quiet, and comfortable. Staff was helpful, and they do keep it quite clean. I was pleased that the air conditioning worked well -- something not common in many European hotels, where many don't seem to appreciate that we Americans love our air conditioning in the summer.  Also pleased that while they didn't have any readily available ice machines, (another thing we Americans are used to in hotels), the front desk staff was VERY willing to fetch and fill a bucket of ice cubes from the kitchen.. nice touch.  Parking very convenient and at no charge.  My only two complaints: NO Wifi in the rooms... common areas only.  This is pretty pathetic for a 4 star (or really any star) hotel.....especially one that carries such a well-known brand name like…

title: GREAT LOCATION, GREAT NIGHTS SLEEP, GREAT STAFF, GREAT RELAXING TIME
review: Ok so the decor was a bit tired, but i expected that for the price paid But ......... The Location was great beds lovely and comfy air con worked fine black out curtains kept early morning sunshine out staff helpful and friendly maid service fine and friendly plenty of choice for breakfast. That's all we needed for a relaxing time.

title: Relaxing family break
review: Just finished a very enjoyable 7 night stay at this hotel. Much better than the reviews on here suggest.   We stayed on the 4th floor and our room was excellent. Big room that suited two adults and one child. Had a large double and a large sofa bed which was made up for us.  Large bathroom. Air con. Room safe. Room cleaned well each day.   Hotel facilities were excellent. We spent a lot of time at the outdoor pool. Good sun spot and never too busy.   Wifi was good in our room and the common areas. Including at the pool.   All staff in hotel friendly and polite except one. More on that later.   Only had breakfast in hotel which was good so cannot comment on lunch and dinner.   Hotel in a great location 10 minutes walk from beach and all the bars and restaurants. Supermarket 5…

title: Good and very bad
review: Just spent a weekend break at this hotel. Good points first. Location 10 mins taxi ride from the airport. 400 metres to the most beautiful beach. Hotel staff very help full. Food and breakfast good. San Juan very Spanish feel. Great for relaxing. Alicante Marina ten minutes taxi ride 15 euros. ** bad points, the hotel is not a 4 star. Needs updating, carpets etc. ** The room was stinking disgustingly of cigarette smoke which made you feel sick. We had to spray the whole room with  every we had, after shave deodorant perfume fresh air spray and leave the windows open. The other strange bad point was that the pool does not open until 10 am daily?? Would i use this hotel, no! I would go back to the resort though, but book a bigger 4 or 5 star hotel.

title: great base to explore
review: Hi seanflanagan423,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel. While we are pleased with your kind regards toward the level of service rendered by our hotel staff members including our location serving its purpose for your travel needs, it is regrettable that the overall cleanliness of our property may have fallen below your expectations and for the pool's hour of operation, which you found unfitting. Please allow me to apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Rest assured, we take our guest's comments very seriously and always strive to provide a wonderful stay. I have faith in our hotel that they will continue to do their best to improve our amenities and services.  Once again, thank you for sharing your feedback. I truly hope that we will have a chance to make it up to you and provide you with a better stay in the future.  Sincerely,  Alvin M. Case Manager IHGService

title: Not a four star
review: After reading the hotel reviews i was a little concerned as to what we would find on our stay . We were two couples who loved our stay here and would def stay here again ..The first plus was the staff they were so friendly and helpful and could not do enough for you , nothing was too much trouble and they were working none stop . We had the continental breakfast which was a lovely fresh toasted roll with jam and butter with fresh coffee and freshly squeezed orange juice and all for 5 euros each  , the full continental looked good as well . One could have a three course evening meal which we do on two nights up to 11pm and it was brilliant for 15 euros each not inc drinks and the standard of food was lovely . All area,s including the pool was spotless  and it was a lovely pool to…

title: Great value, quiet rooms and a fabulous pool area
review: This is a classic, old-style Holiday Inn. The rooms are a little dated but very comfortable and quiet - we slept extremely well. It's only 10 minutes walk to lovely San Juan Beach and loads of restaurants, bars and shops. It also has an excellent pool area with a bar alongside, perfect for sunny afternoons when you're footsore from exploring. It's basic but great at the same time - I would go back definitely.

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: My wife and I stayed here for 7 nights and were a little apprehensive after reading some of the reports. However, we needn't have been so worried. Although there is no doubt that some aspects of the hotel would undoubtedly be improved by some new decoration, the overall standard of the hotel is fine.  The room was large, clean and more than adequate. Bathroom fittings are a bit dated and we did have a problem with the toilet, where the cistern would not fill and continually ran water.  After reporting it to reception, we were immediately offered another room nearby which was fine. Our room was on the 2nd floor and we were very happy with this, however we were glad we didn't have one of the rooms on the ground floor between reception and the lift as nearly every guest in the rest…

title: Good location
review: I visited this week for  2 nights . The hotel is a very old style holiday inn . If you like the new plastic look then this hotel is not for you . The hotel was clean and the rooms were cleaned to a high standard both days I visited . Wifi is free if your are a ihg member . The internet in some upstairs area isn't great . The bar , restaurant and foyer area and by reception is reliable and quick The pool area is a lovely sun trap and is close to the bar 👍 Staff are welcoming and polite . The language barrier can be a problem at times but they go out of the wat to assist. Food and drink prices are hotel prices . More expensive than near by restaurants and bars. If you are travelling into Alicante airport, the bus is a great option for 11 Euro return  The bus stop is less than 4…

title: If what you are looking for is to sleep, this isnt your place!
review: I got to this hotel and they placed me on the ground floor. Normal room, a bit date but it was ok.   After couple of hours in the room i had a problem with the noise coming from one of the room next to mine. I complained to the guys at reception and they changed me to another bedroom. This one right above the swimming pool area which has all the noise of that area till 10.   I was shattered, but I waited till 10 to go to sleep as it was impossible before and at 10:15 i ranged reception to asked them when they were going to shut the swimming pool. They closed it after my call. To my surprised, noise was still happening now from outside my room.   Right outside my room two guys with a bottle of alcohol drinking on the sofas and having the time of their lives. I rang reception…

title: Last minute holiday
review: Hello Maragon27,  Thank you for posting a review about your recent stay with the Holiday Inn Alicante - Playa de San Juan, Spain. It sounds like we fell below your expectations, particularly with noise control. I'm sorry that you weren't able to rest during your visit. We take all reviews very seriously, and I would like the chance to look into this for you. I have sent you a private message to gather more information about your stay.  I have recorded your feedback on corporate level to help evaluate the property and our hotel management will also be alerted to improve soundproofing. It's good to know that you found the food selection at the restaurant pleasing. We find fulfillment in meeting our guests' needs.    Thanks again and I look forward to hear from you!  Best,   Anna B Case Manager IHGService

title: Excellent base
review: Just returned from an amazing week at this hotel in Playa San Juan. We didn't read the reviews before we booked - thank goodness !! I have to wonder if these people stayed at the same hotel ! Staff were very helpful, the hotel was clean (and I'm quite fussy), great bar area. We didn't eat in the restaurant as we preferred to eat along the sea front. The hotel is within easy walking distance of bars, shops, restaurants, the tram and of course the beach - what more could you want ? We had lovely days out on the tram to Benidorm, Alicante and LA Vila for next to nothing. Stayed in room 511 - top floor. Big room and very quiet (email ahead) The weather was fantastic which helped but we can't wait to return.

title: Don't let bad reviews put you off...
review: Just returned from a 3 night stay (15-18 April) at Holiday Inn Alicante with my husband. Firstly, please don't let bad reviews put you off- if you're looking for a luxury 4* hotel, this is not the hotel for you. However, if you're looking for a fairly inexpensive hotel close to the beach to use as a base to explore the beautiful region of Alicante, then this might be the place for you.   Positives: friendly English speaking staff, nice pool area, fairly cheap food and drink prices, free parking, 10 minute walk from a stunning beach, good transport links (number 21 bus to Alicante town right outside hotel and tram is a 5 min walk), early check in (we were allowed to check in at 1pm although official check in is 4pm), late check out at 12pm (and also option to extend check out til…

title: Very bad internet, run down, not very clean
review: Dear Nicky B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are happy to know that you liked our location and we certainly appreciate your nice feedback on our staff. On the other hand, we would like to apologize for the inconvenience caused by other guests during your visit, and for not living up to your expectations regarding our room amenities and internet connection. Reviews like yours are very valuable as they enable us to target areas we need to improve on. Rest assured your feedback will be forwarded to all concerned departments for future reference.  We value you as our guest and hope to accommodate you again for a chance to provide you with a much better experience.  Sincerely,  Joel A Case Manager IHGService

title: Desperately needs upgrading
review: Holiday Inn should meet certain standards. This hotel does not. While it is well situated and staff is - for European standards - friendly and the meals reasonably good, the hotel is totally run down and needs urgently some refurbishing. Rost in the bathroom, curtains and carpets with holes, no fonctioning wi fi (internet), old furniture, not very well equipped etc.etc. When your only interest is to have a hotel close to the beach: OK. If you want a hotel which is worth this name: stay away...

title: Dirty old hotel but good staff
review: Dear Harald W,   Thank you so much for your candor about your stay. We work hard to deliver exceptional guest experience, and it is apparent that we fell short with regards to the cleanliness of your room, intermittent Internet connection, and our hotel aesthetics. Although it was not the happy and comforting experience we were hoping to provide you, I certainly appreciate your kind words for our hotel staff and prime location. I would like to assure you that we pay careful attention to feedback such as you have provided, taking immediate steps to correct any deficiencies. I'm grateful to you for choosing to stay with us. I hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to demonstrate our commitment to satisfaction in all areas of the guest experience.  Warmest Regards,   Gian M Case Manager IHGService

title: IMPROVEMENT DESPERATELY NEEDED!!
review: On arrival we were greeted by the reception lady who couldn't have been more displeased to see us. After demanding our passports she pointed the way to our room. After what seemed like a very long trip we couldn't wait to just lay down for 30mins. On opening the door we walked in to 1970. Everything is outdated from the furniture/decor and even the TV. Mould on the walls is covered up by the wallpaper that is peeling off and the plug holes in the bathroom are extremely dirty. Now I know it's a Holiday Inn so I wasn't expecting the world... however it's apparently a 4 star. The communal areas are clean and look more modern. I wouldn't stay here again even if it were free!

title: NO Free Tea or Coffee
review: Dear David B,  Thank you for your stay and for posting a review on TripAdvisor. Your feedback is extremely important as this will help us to achieve our mission to provide the perfect guest experience.  It is nice to hear that you were satisfied with the cleanliness of our stylish communal area. However, I sincerely apologize for the issues you experienced particularly with the service provided by one of our staff during your check-in and if you found the amenities in your room to be over the hill. Also, my apologies for the upkeep of the bathroom. I have taken note of your valuable comments and will use these to monitor and improve the quality of services and amenities we offer to our guests.    Once again, thank you for your valued feedback. We look forward to having the opportunity of welcoming you back and provide you a better stay here at the Holiday Inn Alicante - Playa de San Juan, Spain.  Kind Regards,   Dhang R. Case Manager IHG Service

title: A lot to improve
review: Pool is outside and not heated.  So if you are travelling in Winter you cannot use the  pool.  Gym is very outdated.  They don't provide free tea or coffee, stayed few times in budget hotels and they provide free Tea and Coffee.  Resturant staff is not very helpful or polite.  Menu is in spanish. Best to eat out.

title: Ok
review: Hi Wilson G,  Thank you for posting a candid feedback from your recent stay with us. I was concerned to see that you were not impressed with our property particularly with the pool, fitness center, and restaurant among the others. I would like to apologize for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you during your stay. Rest assured, your comments will be shared with our management team to properly address your concerns.    Again, thank you for the review and I hope that you would still consider staying with us again in the future.    Regards,    Mike F. Case Manager  IHGService

title: Value for money
review: Well, don't know how to rate without being rude. This hotel has their good things: location, rate (winter), parking (important here), internet not bad. Anyway when considering stay here must be aware the hotel is old, needing a lot of work: wallpaper to be replaced (or fixed), not much electrical connections, etc. Breakfast is poor. Staff isn't courteous (unfortunately a problem as many other in Spain).

title: Standard.
review: This hotel was nice and clean, a typical holiday inn. Although the staff are not very helpful, and the restaurant inside doesn't have much choice or even nice food. The food around the hotel is horrible. I tried about 10 different restaurants and the food was awful in them all. As far as entertainment and things to do there isn't really anything. The beach is nice. We ended up taking the tram to Benidorm which took over an hour but was a lot better than Alicante.

title: Old, but cheap, with horrible food
review: Hi Bethanymags,   Thanks for choosing Holiday Inn Alicante - Playa de San Juan, Spain and for leaving feedback.   I appreciate your comments about the hotel's upkeep and I am pleased that your overall stay was satisfactory.   It is unsettling to read that your expectations with the restaurant was not met because of the food options and that you found limited activities in the vicinity. I will be forwarding your review to our hotel's management so that these areas can be given attention.   I am hoping that you will visit Holiday Inn again despite this experience.   Kind Regards,   Anna B.  Case Manager IHGService

title: Annual meeting
review: The upside to the hotel is the price. For a hotel with swimming-pool & sauna, 400 meters from the beach only, for €49 per night... the price is low, hence I gave it 2 stars instead of the 1 star it actually deserved if the price was higher. The hotel looks & smells like nothing changed since the 80's, stains on the carpet in the hallways, noisy, and worn interior. I feel the springs in the (bouncy) bed, the tv is tiny, interior worn... and then came the worst: the food in the restaurant was the worst I ever had ! Besides the fact that I can't believe there's restaurants that still serve foie gras (which they shouldn't !), I left most of the plates un-touched, both the starter & the main. The mushrooms in the starter were so salty, chewy & overdone that I actually spat it back in…

title: How not to run a Hotel
review: Dear Onderdijk,  Thanks for providing time to leave feedback about your recent visit. Making your stay a complete success is our goal and with that in mind, I regret to learn that we fell short of your expectations as you were let down by the overall upkeep of your assigned room and bedding condition and that the food options at the restaurant were not to your liking. Though I would prefer that you have had a more pleasant experience, I appreciate your candor in writing your review. Comments like yours are taken seriously and will be relayed to the management to address areas that need further improvements.  I value you as an IHG Rewards Club Spire Elite member and I am hopeful that you give us another chance to host you again should you return to the area so we may show you that we can be better.  Safe travels,  Jillian I Case Manager IHGService

title: average hotel
review: This hotel is chosen because it has meeting rooms and a separate area for dining.  It is used mainly on the Saturday for the meeting but many couples go to the hotel for the weekend.  The men have their meeting and the ladies go shopping in Alicante

title: Pleasant
review: A nice quite hotel ,the family room was good size but the decor and fittings were a bit tired .The staffs understanding of English was poor .The hotel seemed to be quite short staffed .the food we had was good and reasonably price but the drinks were expensive and the bar was not maned at all times .Parking was available and secure.

title: Very relaxed
review: We have stopped here over the years on many occasions and found this hotel ticked the box. On a positive observation for the owners we noticed that the corridor carpet was looking rather tired and in need of a upgrade. We was stopping in the lower ground floor, and found this very dark. The bedroom was in need of a upgrade as the room was very dark and In need of a paint job. As for the fact that there was no wi fi not good.  After a few days we request that we be moved and was put on the 4th floor with wi fi.  Overall we love the this hotel  and the staff here and we'll be back again.😊

title: Staff cant keep covering for this hotel
review: Dear Dalton P,  It is always encouraging to hear feedback from frequent guests like yourself. We apologize that you found our hotel amenities below your expectations particularly the Wifi and lighting condition in the initial room assigned.   On a lighter note, it is good to know that you are pleased with how our hotel staff handled your concerns and we are excited to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Danelle A Case Manager IHGService

title: Very Very Disappointed
review: 2nd visit to this hotel, chose as great value for money. I don’t know how much longer the staff can cover for the awful state of the décor inside this hotel. The carpets tiles are all faded, stained and patchy. The room décor needs a complete refit – the wardrobe doors did not work, there were no net curtains at anybody’s windows (the rail was there!) The wheels on the bed make sitting up in bed impossible as there is no headboard, so you just push away from the wall and end up with a big gap. The room was fantastically clean and the towels and bed linen were good quality. There was only one power point and this was under the desk, which was very difficult to access – impossible probably for someone with a disability. No fridge ( but there had been at some point!) Whilst here…

title: Disappointed/Dirty
review: Where to begin ! I was quite taken back when I visited this hotel on the outside I looked like it ticked all the boxes I was pretty impressed after all I'd been travelling for a few days visiting friends so was in need of a holiday inn 5 star treatment. How wrong could I have been first impressions rude receptionist ! Quite clearly on my booking I ticked the box double bed non smoking etc. What I actually got was totally  the opposite 2 singles ( smoking) absolutely stink to high heaven. So back I went to ask for what I originally booked I was told quite abruptly " we cannot guarantee a double bed or non smoking room"  eventually I was given a room my of my choice why they didn't do that in first place I don't know. Maybe I was important enough ! So eventually got to the room…

title: Great Location .. and hotel
review: Stayed here on my points earned as ihg staff member. Hotel is spotless. Staff very friendly.. lovely pool. Great menu. Location perfect. San juan beach and restaurants all amazing. Great if you speak Spanish as is not very touristy.. Al oleo great tapas and Los packs great menu and food. Bowie pop moments and texaco lovely staff and always open late.. defiantly will return here. We had a ball !! Muchas Gracias a todos Los empleados todos muy amables .. Seguro que volvemos pronto ☺

title: No internet in the rooms, bathroom dirty downstairs
review: No, it`s not a bad place. Especially since we reserved cheap! Friendly staff, decent pool, but for some reason the outdoor bar was not open. But here`s the shocker: Wi-Fi does not reach the rooms. This was a not a technical glitch so I was told, no; this is the way it`s meant to be!? Welcome to the 90`s? Around the pool and in the reception area there`s Wi-Fi and otherwise in some of the alleyways you can catch it too. Very strange. The general bathroom downstairs was very dirty too. But it`s a decent room and ample parking! The TV channel selection was limited, but it included some international channels.

title: Needs some TLC
review: Dear JuRut,  Thank you for the sharing your experience with us and for choosing our property for your travel needs. I appreciate the kind remarks towards our friendly staff, parking area, room accommodation and hotel pool. I do however regret that we were unable to meet your expectations with our WIFI service, cleanliness of the bathroom. Your comments have been taken very seriously and have been shared with the Management Team, in order to help us improve further the service and products that we have to offer.   Again, thank you for your valuable feedback. We hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you should your travels bring you back our way.  Sincerely,    Zelyn N. Case Manager  IHGService

title: I've stayed in many Holiday Inns and this one was disappointing. Misleading room/service\hotel description.
review: Location was good as it was 5-10 minute walk down to the beach. Bus to town was across the road from the hotel, and the same for on the way back, always took the 21 to and from Alicante town, only €1.45 for a single ticket! Staff was friendly and enjoyed our attempts at speaking Spanish! Dinner was lovely - priced at €15 for 3 course meal, the breakfast wasn't tempting so always went to the restaurants by the beach. Restaurant staff, Llando (lovely blonde girl with long hair) and Domingo, really attentive and lovely! Took the tram to Benidorm (from Luceros in the town centre to Benidorm) for the day to see what it was like, took an hour and tickets were about €12 euros for two returns.   However, the decor was dated and needed some work. The carpets were visibly stained,…

title: Inexistent customer service. Rude and unprofessional reception staff
review: Dear pradalovestotravelx,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to write us a review. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. I am pleased you regarded our location to be good and staff friendly. On the other hand, we are very sorry you did not experience an exemplary hotel stay with regard to the stains in the carpet and issues with the room amenities to be a let down. We highly appreciate your feedback and I will be forwarding this to management since this is our best resource for improvements and achieving superior guest satisfaction.   We look forward to serving you again in the future and see the improvements made.   Sincerely,    Dianne L.  Case Manager  IHGService

title: Good value and location
review: A good location for San Juan beach (10 minute walk) and a quiet area out of season. Lots of eating places along the beach and in the shopping area (about 10 minutes away).  The breakfast buffet is a bit limited so go out if it's not included.  There's only 1 public internet terminal wth no printer so reception have to print things for you like airline boarding passes. Don't know what the wifi is like.  I've stayed several times and the rooms need some maintenance especially the bathrooms (discoloured tiles, etc). The beds are on wheels and can slide about sometimes.  The hotel is near a supermarket and tram stop (Hollanda). The tram system is excellent and goes north to Benidorm (about an hour) and Denia further up the coast.

title: We'd actually give it 4.5 stars!!!
review: Dear jenny0198,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us your feedback. I am pleased to know that you liked our location and our property of good value. Your review is vital for improving the service and quality we offer to our valued guest. It is always hugely motivating when one takes the time and trouble to acknowledge and give points for improvement on our hotel rooms and breakfast options. This feedback will be shared with the appropriate people that can help us make a difference to ensure our valued guests' needs and expectations are met in the future.   Thank you once again for your valuable comment, and if you might have any suggestions that will contribute to enhancing your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us.  Sincerely,  Krysllin G. Case Manager IHGService

title: Ideal location only 10 minutes from the beach and restaurants.
review: We have stayed here multiple times and really like the hotel & location.  Good Location is fantastic near fantastic beach. Public transport is easy & inexpensive. Hotel is super-clean. My wife is a "clean-freak" - She approves - praise indeed!! All the staff are friendly and speak some English - although at least attempting some Spanish is usually appreciated. Rates are usually quite affordable and offer excellent value. Breakfast is good. Early check-in is often available. AirCon although a little old looking - seems to do the job OK.  OK for us but some may not agree Some pool loungers are a bit flimsy although not sure why anybody wouldn't go to the beautiful beach which is not too far away. Decor is a little dated in rooms - Some of the carpets in the hallways are a tiny bit…

title: Hardly a Holiday Inn  -don't expect any service -just  a shrug when things go wrong!
review: Not a 4 star hotel in my opinion but met our needs OK. Would have liked tea/coffee making facility in the room.  Excellent choices for breakfast. Cannot comment on the evening meals as we ate out every night. Pool was clean and safe and the staff were helpful.    We used the Tram/train to get about, dead easy to use and very cheap.

title: Very clean and ideal hotel, only 10 minutes walking to beach and restaurants
review: Dear Mr. John  Thank you for contacting the Holiday Inn Alicante Playa de San Juan regarding your experience during your recent stay. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas, We welcome any opportunity to improve.  Thanks a lot for your words, we appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us. It has been a real pleasure to have you in our hotel.  I will communicate these words to all our hotel´s employees.  Once again, we appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us.  Best regards.

title: No where near a four star!
review: Lovely environment especially for Children or Family - within city reach,close to the famous San Juan beach,within lovely residential area,nice breakfast,fast check in and check out,staff are friendly and helpful.   Flooring is completely out of touch need replacement,Internet is crap,the tennis court is chargeable to your room,the holiday should be 2 star rated until fully renovated and refurbished.

title: Clean and budgeted. Overall an average experience.
review: Dear ademolao180,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay. I'm glad that you found our hotel location convenient, and I'm happy to hear you had a pleasant check-in. I do apologize if you were not able to fully enjoy your visit, and for the shortcomings you have experienced with the overall condition at the hotel. We have taken note of your feedback and will be used to focus on improving guest satisfaction. We look forward to serving you again so we can show you how we are continuously improving.  Sincerely,  Tracy V. Case Manager IHGService

title: Short sunny brake in Costa Blanca
review: The room was good. Definitely, the interior need renovation. Overall you get value for money. We had stayed there for 7 nights and hadn't included breakfast in our package. Though we tried the breakfast and it was really expensive. Euro 25 for two person. At the nearby beach you have plenty of restaurants and you can get breakfast for 4-5 Euros per person. Most of the staff is friendly and courteous except the restaurant staff. Lady on the bar is super rude and would make you feel as if you are not a customer but a beggar asking for free meal may be!! Complete turn off. One of the reasons you would never like to go to the restaurant.Also, the menu options are limited in comparison to what is offered by restaurants nearby. Pool is nice but pool side beds are super uncomfortable…

title: An Ignored Hotel Guest
review: Dear latikaraja87,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback regarding your stay with us. We give the utmost importance to our guest comments as they help us improve, and continually provide the best guest experience possible. Please accept our sincere apology for the shortcomings you experienced during your stay and regret our service and accommodations did not live up to your expectations. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas, We welcome any opportunity to improve. Only we inform you we also have a Continental Breakfast for 5euros per person that guest can take in our cafeteria, if not necesary take Buffet. And our Tamayo Restaurant have dishes from 7,00euros, also if not necesary take carte or menu, you have other options.   Again, thank you for your review.

title: Disappointed This time
review: The hotel itself is in good location,only short distance from sandy beach.  Definitely not 4 stars,but 3 yes. Hotel staff is friendly and helpful. Literally,small and tidy hotel with free WiFi and parking.

title: Strike 1- Day 1 / 8 August 2016
review: Have stayed here many times and although moderately disappointing in some areas some new changes have really jumped the shark. 1. Pay up front for entire stay at check in. What hotel does that?  2. Pay 40€ up front for pool towel service. 3. Fridge removed from room.  4. Filthy carpets on 4th floor. 5. Broken toilet flush  Stay tuned for day 2-8!  As usual nothing will change and a shmo from IHG will respond thanking me for feedback and nothing will,change.

title: Average.
review: Dear Lucas T,   Thank you for taking time to share your experience with us. I am sorry to hear that you did not fully enjoy your time in our hotel. We take comments such as these very seriously and would like to follow up with you. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain more information.    I look forward to hearing back from you very soon.  Best Regards,  John O Case Manager IHGService

title: never again
review: We stayed in the hotel for a few nights and considering the price we expected a little bit more. We had a junior suite which was basically two beds (one of which was an uncomfortable sofa bed), a chair, bathroom and an extra TV aswell as a kettle! The balcony was pretty big but no decent view. The room was first floor and close to reception at the top of the stairs so noisy at night (we would have requested a room change had we stopped longer). The room and parts of hotel looked tired but appeared clean. The pool was lovely and the staff were friendly, polite and helpful - Anabel (I hope I spelt her name right) on reception was very pleasant to us on arrival and a credit to Holiday Inn. A few improvements and we would definitely return. The location was okay but if you are to…

title: Very tired hotel
review: Dear toffeeblu,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking the time to write us a review. I am truly touched and grateful for your very kind review regarding our friendly and helpful reception staff, found our pool to be lovely and location accessible. On the other hand, it is regrettable that you found the hotel only at average best. Kindly accept our sincere apologies for falling short of your expectations. Your feedback is highly appreciated as this will help us look for more ways on how to provide you with a better stay in the future. I hope that you would still consider staying with us in the future and may give us a chance to show you the improvements made.   Sincerely,  Dianne L Case Manager IHGService

title: Very Tired. In need of refurbishment !
review: the wifi does not work, there was no electricity in the rooms!! the pool was dirty, the location bad, the reception was unfriendly and did not speak english very good. this is no 4 star hotel. i cant recommend this hotel. it is not worth 170€/ night.

title: Ruined holiday
review: Shame Shame Shame This so called 4 star hotel to be a part of the Holiday Inn group should be scrubbed of their member list. As an Accor member I will now think before booking another of their hotels. I and my wife have worked all our lives and saved to travel. I had a reservation for 3 nights but stayed only two . We booked a double room but was told they only had twin room and they never gave a bed option. I told the girl I had booked other Holiday Inns with bed preference and she said it was not true. It wasn't that we had twin beds it was the attitude I resented. The room was a good size and the A/C worked but there is no fridge and only one drinking glass for 2 people. Coming back from a walk I asked for ice and was told the cost is2 euros. I have never had to pay for ice.…

title: Mediocre in every way
review: Dear lonsic,   Thank you for taking time to share your experience with us. I am sorry to hear that you did not fully enjoy your time in our hotel. We take comments such as these very seriously and would like to follow up with you. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain more information.    I look forward to hearing back from you very soon.  Best Regards,  John O Case Manager IHGService

title: Going downhill
review: Hotel itself and rooms need a upgrade to this century. Everything looks and feels very old. Besides that hotel has nice facilities: pools for adults and kids, tennis court, play park for kids and even the gym which at the moment is kind of empty room. We tried breakfast and dinner and we didnt like the food, although price was cheap. Hotel has free Wi-Fi but it doesnt work very well. A lot of free parking is a plus. Hotel is nearby the beach and restaurants but it takes a while to walk there. So the location is not perfect either. Like I said topic, it's very mediocre in every way.

title: Family Holiday
review: Dear Tero S,  Thank you for writing a review on our hotel. Our goal is to deliver exceptional service and superior accommodation to all of our guests and we appreciate your business with us. It is nice to know that the tennis court and the pool facility are well to your liking. However, it is regrettable if you found the rooms dated and if your dining experience did not exceed your expectations. Your feedback is of great importance to us as this allows us to monitor and improve the quality of our amenities and facilities we offer.
