Rest assured these concerns will be forwarded to the hotel management for evaluation and will be a basis for future improvements.  Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope we get the opportunity to show you some of our improvements on your next trip.  Sincerely,  Grace P. Case Manager IHGService

title: Nothing to complain about
review: This was our ninth stay at this hotel and each time it gets more and more tired. The decor and fittings in the room were exactly as they were ten years ago. Gone is the mini bar in the rooms. Wi - fi is worse than dreadful and room cleaning is poor. The lounge bar also has not changed. Pool bar is also limited in the times it is open now. The bar after a request for Smirnoff vodka still did not have it after five days after they ran out. Sorry to say we won't be back for a tenth time.

title: Very average
review: Where do I start..... The rooms are very outdated and in need of a modernisation. The pool is nice expect the staff that work there don't seem to like the British, as the group of us were playing in the pool and they were very strict in how loud, what we could do, drink etc. Yet for the Spanish people they were fine.  The front desk had a sign which states that 'all major cards are excepted' when exchanging money.. But it turns out that they only except cash but when I attempted to exchange money, they replied with sorry we have hit the limit.. I don't think they quite know the process..  Would I come back to this hotel... No

title: Outstanding hotel, great value, great food, great service
review: Dear James T   Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at Holiday Inn Alicante Playa De San Juan. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We appreciate your nice comment about the pool.  However, we’re sorry we fell below your expectation regarding customer service. We will address this concern. We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.   Sincerely,    Orlando A.  Case Manager  IHGService

title: Great Location
review: We travelled to this hotel with expectations that it would be like a travelodge - we hadn't paid a kings ransom for our stay.  The hotel is scrupulously clean, and the rooms were very well designed with everything you need.  All towels, toiletries, hangers, safe, all the bedding you could need and very good air conditioning to name a few.  There were some scuffs etc but in a busy hotel these are to be expected.  The bathroom was surprisingly large, and well designed with copious amounts of hot water.  The pool area was large and well kept, the pool well maintained.  Plenty of sunbeds, with parasols and a little pool bar providing drinks, ice creams, food etc. The restaurant is brilliant value, with a 3 course meal (with generous portions and big choice) for 15E - also an a la…

title: Mr
review: Dear Deborah B. Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our staff takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again.   Sincerely, Sales Manager

title: Nice hotel
review: The hotel is in need of an upgrade but it is clean and friendly with good facilities, pool etc. its in a lovely area, short walk to the beach which was clean and not too busy, bus and tram stops nearby to get into Alicante.

title: Decent enough hotel, nice stay...
review: I booked a long weekend break in Alicante for myself and my partner using IHG Rewards points for the hotel stay.  The hotel is situated in a residential area about 800 meters from the main promenade / beach area of Playa de San Juan where the majority of the local bars and restaurants are congregated. The walk back from the promenade is uphill, but not strenuous in any way, and the hotel is also close to numerous tram stops if you wanted to travel further afield on the excellent Alicante - Benidorm tram link.  The hotel is typical of a continental Holiday Inn, not massively luxurious, but perfectly clean and functional for a short stay or business trip.  The hotel, unusually for Holiday Inn hotels, has a pool and sunbathing area set around the pool and garden adjacent to the…

title: Location
review: Dear leedsls27,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay and for being a loyal IHG Rewards Club Platinum member. Allow us to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced due to the ongoing renovations. Although it is regrettable that you did not fully enjoy your stay, we appreciate that you have shared your concerns with us. Let us assure you that we will continuously work on maintaining and improving our property in order to accommodate you better in the future. I do hope that you will give us the chance to make it up to you and provide you with the service you deserve.  Sincerely,  Faith R Case Manager IHGService

title: Horror stories TRUE! Stay away...no quedarse en este hotel
review: It's a holiday inn so you know what you are going to get.  The staff are great. The food is fine , everywhere us clean.  The pool is in a large area and there are ample beds. The location is 5 mins to the be ach and 5 mins to the avenida naciones line 4 tram. The hotel is low rise which is nice.    Theresnot much to fault but it is getting a bit tired.

title: Never ever again!
review: Las historias de horror son ciertas, no tirar su plata en un hotel que no es para nada 4 estrellas!!!  PLEASE READ AND HEED THE WARNING  We arrived around 5:30pm, to check swiftly into the hotel and then hopefully straight out onto the swimming pool as it was a lovely sunny day.  We had driven past the hotel a couple of days previously and actually stopped to ask reception about availability of rooms and looked around the swimming pool and it all looked reasonably good.  However, the reception area and the swimming pool at the time were the only reasonable presentable areas as we were to find out.  we were given our room keys but there was no warning that the swimming pool was closed or no apology for that matter from the male receptionist.  As we walked away from reception we…

title: Short break
review: Dear Dear GeoSA,  Thank you for writing us a candid review regarding your stay. We certainly regret the overall dissatisfaction you had experienced during your stay. I have sent you a private message in order to obtain more information about your stay. We hope to hear from you soon and be of further assistance.  Sincerely,  Dianne L. Case Manager IHGService

title: PLEASE PLEASE TAKE NOTE OF TERRIBLE REVIEWS IT IS NOT A JOKE
review: This will be a lengthy tale but one worth reading. So book a trip for 5 days to recoup. Read the reviews on here and got slightly worried so emailed the hotel. Explained I had booked to bring my sister out after dealing with some stresses and was worried about the reviews. They write back.....don't worry the hotel is lovely...there are no issues....all rooms are lovely. So we arrive and see a sign on the door saying the pool area is closed all week.........OMG.  So we speak to the guy behind the counter and explain if the pool is closed why do you not put it on the website or tell us in the email exchange.  The guy tells us the pool is open in the morning and not to worry. So we check in. Rooms shabby ....rotten door frames, tiles hanging off, mates springs lovely to lay on…

title: Holiday inn
review: Dear Clairebear2905,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. It is regrettable that the overall level of service you have received did not live up to your expectations. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. Let me follow-up on your concerns. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain additional information. I look forward to your response and be of further assistance.  Sincerely,  Faith R Case Manager IHGService

title: Smoke smoke
review: The rooms are basic but good for a short stay. We had an issue with our first room ( advice keep away from 1-8) but this was sorted to our satisfaction. Food is reasonably priced and was good. 10 min walk to beach and local bars and restaraunts. Pool was nice to have.

title: Nice hotel in very quiet area
review: Sometimes you get surprised, what hotels promise on internet and what you get. This hotel put us in a room where the smoke was hanging thick. We turned in the door and asked for a non-smoking room, but the reception told us that there were no one available. So why offer rooms that you don’t have? The positive thing was that they had a nice swing pool and the staff was friendly.

title: Room 137.. DO NOT STAY IN ROOM 137!!
review: Dear HansSueco,  Thank you for taking time to post a review of our property.  I am pleased to hear that you liked the nice swimming pool and friendly staff.  Guest comfort and satisfaction are of the utmost concern to us and our hotel is committed to making every possible effort to provide comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations.  I am sorry for the strong smelt of smoke in your room.  It is not our intent to cause undue distress to our guests.  Please  accept my sincerest apologies for any discomfort this issue may have caused you.  I hope to have an opportunity to serve you again and so we can make it up to you.   I value you as our guest and hope you will continue to choose IHG for your future travel needs.   Sincerely,   Lera P Case Manager  IHGService

title: Noisy noisy noiay
review: Arrived late in the evening to a 24 hour reception desk, not particularly friendly greeting and I had emailed in advance stating we were late arrivals. Corridor smelt of awful body odour and room was adequate for our purpose.  Bed made a horrendous noise when you rolled over and all night people were coming and going and paper thin walls. Plenty of free parking onsite and pool looked clean and neat gardens. Would not recommend to stay as not near the airport if you need a close stay. Beach was absolutely beautiful with local delicacies available, very traditional and worth a visit Do not touch this hotel

title: Enjoyed
review: Dear Nataliel1978,  Thank you for your stay and your comments. We're so sorry to hear that you had a noisy stay with us. Your comments have been escalated and we will look into the situation. In line with this, we have sent you a private message to obtain more information.   Again, thank you for being our guest and look forward to hearing from you soon.  Sincerely,  Christian C. Case Manager IHGService

title: One night
review: This is a lovely hotel & lovely staff. Disappointed wifi wasn't available in the rooms which would of made a business trip difficult. Rooms are dated but that reflects the price. Enjoyable stay & would consider staying again.

title: A lovely holiday inn
review: Hotel needs a definite upgrading ,very tired. Rooms are long past refurbishing. Breakfast and dining room staff are great. For a hotel in a resort area, it is just adequate. The Holiday inn franchise should take a good look at this hotels potential.

title: Not a hotel for modern people
review: Dear Joe D,  Thank you for submitting your review of our hotel.  I am pleased to note that you liked the service you received from our staff in the dining area.  We work diligently to ensure our facilities are well maintained and we try our hardest to provide not just good value, but comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations.  Your feedback regarding the current state of the facility particularly with the rooms have been forwarded to the hotel management.  Kindly accept my sincere apologies for falling short of your expectations in these areas.  We are highly motivated by your words and ensure you that we shall continue to strive for excellence.  I value you as our guest and hope you will continue to choose IHG for your future travel needs.   Sincerely,   Lera P Case Manager  IHGService

title: Adequate Hotel
review: My husband and I have just returned from staying at this hotel and we found it to be adequate for our needs definitely not 4 star.  Room a little tired and needs updating the cleanliness of the room was excellent and we had clean sheets and towels everyday however, there were no tea and coffee facilities which was very disappointing.  Mini bar in room was very inexpensive, pool area very nice and clean.  We ate in the restaurant one evening which was very good and again inexpensive for 3 courses 15 euros also bar prices for a hotel again very good.  Unfortunately for us the down staff was that we found the staff although very friendly, the service was very poor and slow.

title: No frills but adequate for short stay
review: Hello Betty, thank you for your comments. We inform you that we are doing renovations and remodeling our facilities and we feel that your stay was not entirely to his liking. We hope to count on your presence. Thanks and regards.

title: Great
review: This was the second time we stayed here recently -each for 3 days. While facilities are very basic and in need of an upgrade, the hotel was adequate for our short stay but nowhere near a 4 star rating in my opinion. On arrival there is free secure parking and the check-in welcoming and efficient with no delays. We had booked online and the daily room  rate was just over Eu40 which was reasonable value. Although the rooms are adequate in size, the decor is very dated and the tv antiquated. Nevertheless we were able to get into our room at 1pm and the cleanliness icluding the bathroom was excellent for our stay. Free wifi is provided with strong signal. Other facilities include a small gym and a nice pool area although not heated. Dining and bar facilities are average. The hotel…

title: It was fine for what it was
review: Dear mervspain,  Thank you for leaving a review about your stay with us. We appreciate your nice feedback regarding our hotel of good value and convenient. On the other hand, it is regretful that you found our hotel needing some upgrade. I have forwarded your concerns to the hotel management and will be a basis for an upgrade.   We hope you will consider us again and see the improvements made.  Sincerely,  Dianne L. Case Manager IHGService

title: horrible.
review: Stayed here with my husband read all the reviews and yes it needs an update but the staff were more than helpful.  We were upgraded to a suite with a balcony the size of a terrace.  It was clean and as you would expect a holiday inn. There was a short walk to the wonderful beach and the other direction the tram stop into town. Will definitely stay there again. Don't be put off by the poor feedback

title: Great facilities
review: Have been staying in this hotel for 15 years now, we love the location and there facilities, but it is in desperate need of a make over, the swimming pool is great and they have a smaller pool for children, whilst the gym is not big it is sufficient for any one that needs to workout on holiday,there are two tennis courts and the restaurant offers a set course for those with a limited budget,breakfast is excellent and the staff very helpful, I would say it is very family friendly,golf course very near,but as I have said it needs a make over,

title: Friendly staff, hotel undergoing renovation
review: Dear TERRY O,  Warm greetings from Holiday Inn Alicante-Playa De San Juan. We rely on guest feedback as this will allow us to improve wherever possible. Thank you for noting our good location and facilities. It is also good to know that you found our staff to be friendly and that you were pleased with the breakfast options. However, I am sorry for the disappointments you had with the overall look of our property. Your comments are noted and forwarded to our management team for proper evaluation and improvement.  Until your next visit, we remain at your service.  Sincerely,  Ingrid V. Case Manager IHGService

title: Nice staff - tired hotel
review: We stayed for 4 nights here at the end of December. Our room was nicely cleaned and the wifi worked great. But as others have mentioned there are areas where the hotel needs attention. Not much in terms of amenities - at least not what I expect from Holiday Inn. We needed toothpaste and all they had were the small packets with a toothbrush. You can see there are signs of previous damp and worn carpet in the hotel. The staff are very friendly, and helpful. Affordable. The location is convenient to the beach, transportation, nearby restaurants and shops. Being so close to the beach, I can see why there're issues of damp. Plenty of hot water so I think your experience depends on the room. It was easy to get there from Alicante airport by bus (C6 to 21, total cost per person €5.30).…

title: Horrible experience
review: Staff are generally good, pleasant and nice. Hotel is tired, rooms are worn, old decor and bathrooms scruffy.  You get a small sponge and shoe shine in the bathroom, no errrr soap, tooth brush or shaving stuff Great parking, but location from Airport is around 25km, also around 12km from Alicante harbour so not much around in the winter months.  Breakfast is just about ok, nothing warm just basics, bread and non branded cereal & a coffee machine which sounds like a jet engine It's a 3 star at the moment at best

title: holiday inn
review: Good afternoon David, I feel that staying at our hotel was not entirely pleasant. I inform you that we are making reforms both in lounges and in rooms. True, these distances are both aeropuesto as Alicante, but also to the good weather we have, even at this time of year is very nice walk along the beach area, which is 400m. Hotel, where they have cafes and restaurants. I hope that we will have you here.

title: Staff lovely,  hotel tired
review: This hotel is in need of a refurbishment.  It is ok, but lots of little things need improvement.   Top of the list.   Wifi is terrible.  Lack of electric sockets near the bed.   Tired and dated decor.   Poor value for money at breakfast.  No kettles in standard rooms.   No overt acknowledgement of Spire status until I asked for upgrade.  Upgraded room was better but still dated and tired.   There is nothing majorly wrong with this place that a little investment wouldn't put right.   The staff are an asset.   Friendly,  helpful and nice.

title: Poor
review: Good Morning, I thank the entries indicates, I regret that has not had a very pleasant stay. As for what we said, I inform you that we are doing renovations and improvements. The Wi Fi is open, but is subject to availability, in all common areas and most rooms have, and all rooms have air conditioning and heating, the difference is that the superior rooms are larger. Thank you very much for your clarification with our staff, I will get their comments. Best regards.

title: Basic, great value.
review: Ants in room, lights not working, one glass in a room for two, telephone not working so have to go down to reception, and could not get a drink in the overpriced bar due to poor service. Obviously it is a budget hotel but it ain't that cheap considering the sub standard accommodation and service.  My advice would be don't bother and find somewhere else. I will be in future.

title: Comfortably Average
review: Buenos días, Lamento que su estancia en nuestro hotel no fuera del todo agradable, siento los incidentes ocasionados. Le informo que estamos haciendo mejoras y reformas, y espero que volvamos a contar con su presencia en un futuro.

title: Great hotel
review: Forced into last minute stay here for a few nights. Hotel is dated like many. Could find faults for fun re decor etc but at the price per room per night it gets 4 star. Has plenty facilities and decent poolside area, great location and very very cheap. Staff friendly. Have paid a lot more for very similar standard of hotel.

title: great location
review: although this hotel is not in centre of alicante in my opinion is very well located.getting to lovely san juan playa takes only 10minutes or even less.shops,cafes and restaurants are also easy to reach by foot.and if you want to get to centre of Alicante you can take tram which is also 3min away from hotel.when it comes to rooms they are nice but in my opinion some things need maintance work.hotel is not new i suppose.pool not to big but very chilling and not very busy.breakfast good although seeing every day poached eggs got boring.but still its worth staying there.

title: Comfortable Stay Near The Beach.
review: My wife and I have just returned after spending 10 wonderful nights in the Holiday Inn. We had room 504 on the fifth floor which is the highest in the hotel. I had requested a high floor before arrival after reading some poor reviews of rooms on the lower floors. Check in staff on arrival were excellent and in no time we were in our room. Was a little bit concerned after reading some reviews but we were pleasantly surprised by the room.The room was spacious, comfortable and had excellent air conditioning. It had a wooden floor and a well stocked mini-bar. There was a small flat screen TV although unfortunately there was only one English 24 hour BBC world news channel. The bathroom was a good size and had plenty of amenities. Overall the room was very comfortable. We had…

title: Relaxed but rather chaotic
review: Helpful staff, but things didn't really work. Wifi didn't reach bedrooms and wasn't great anywhere else. Getting in and out of the compound was a bit fiddly. Not very convenient for the beach or anything else. Paid around 60 euros, which was fair enough but would have resented paying the full rate. Nice reception staff who didn't seem at all bothered about us checking out late, and helpfully printed boarding passes for me.

title: Pleasant stay
review: Dear Richard C,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your thoughts and comments regarding your stay with us. We strive very hard to make each and every guest's stay perfect however, it appears we fell short of our goal during your visit. We would like to apologize for failing to meet your expectations regarding our internet connection. We also regret any inconvenience you may have experienced. In spite of these, we are pleased to know that you found our reception staff to be nice. Reviews like yours are very valuable as they enable us to target areas we need to improve on. In addition, your feedback has been forwarded to our management for evaluation.  We value you as our guest and hope to have another opportunity to provide you a much better experience.  Sincerely,  Joel A Case Manager IHGCare

title: Great Family Hotel - well run and good location
review: Polite and helpful staff, great breakfast and excellent pool although childrens playground could be better - consists of just one slide, a table and four chairs. Booked at very shrot notice but we thought it was very good value for money

title: Quite okay for a vacation hotel
review: I took my 6-year old daughter on a short trip to Spain. The purpose was to enjoy as much sun as possible at a pool and the beach. It seems that I picked a very good hotel for those purposes. The hotel is located within 10 minutes of walking distance to the wonderful Alicante beach. Most of the time we hang out by the pool, enjoyed beverages and ice-cream from the poolbar. We had a very good time. I am not sure which room category was assigned to us, but the room was okay. Nothing really fancy and a bit run-down. But we didnt spent much time in our room anyway. The bed was really comfortable, though. And the aircondition was a blessing. The hotel charges 9 EUR for breakfast if you book at the time of ckeck-in. As a walk-in customer you would pay 12 EUR. We found the breakfast to…

title: Hit and Miss
review: We arrived early so the hotel was nice enough to allow us to store our luggage for free until our room became available. I requested a room at a higher floor with wifi and a fridge because August is extremely hot, need a place for cold drinks. We were told there were no rooms available at higher floors but they would move us the next day. So we go to the room (ground level), a very old looking room I should add and realize the AC does not work. After a few mins of trying to figure it out I go to the reception and let them know the AC doesn't work so they immediately hand me a remote! WOW! Are you kidding me; you would think they would've handed me the remote when I checked in rather than have me go back and ask for an explanation? Maybe they assumed we'd be happy without a…

title: Good experience...Does what it says on the tin
review: Dear Stef H,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review about your stay with us. We are glad to know that you liked the second room you were given. However, we would like to apologize for the less than satisfactory level of service you received from our front desk staff. We also regret the issues you had with your first room. We give the utmost importance to our guest comments as they help us improve, and continually provide the best guest experience possible. In addition, your feedback has been forwarded to our management for evaluation.  Again, our apologies for the inconvenience and we hope to accommodate you once more for a chance to provide you a much better experience.  Sincerely,  Joel A Case Manager IHGCare

title: Looking tired
review: Good value....rooms OK if a little tired... Corridors need a makeover but Breakfast excellent Pool good although some more sombrillas would be nice.... Staff excellent..helpful...No complaints EXCEPT... The door stop is a piece of metal right beside the bath/shower...5 cms of vertical metal that you could stand on when getting out of the bath....This needs to be removed and a better option considered... all in all a very good experience...

title: Great location
review: We returned to the Holiday Inn Playa de San Juan after a 7 year gap. We love the location for it's peace and quiet. Other times we have been slightly out of season, so it was much quieter. We had booked a suite here as we were staying 6 nights. On arrival the staff allowed us to lock our bags away as we arrived on a early flight. So we spent several hours by the pool until our room was ready. The room (131) was a little dissapointing as the balcony had a huge extractor chimney in front of it. So not only was it unsightly, you had a constant drone from the fan from the kitchen below. And the kitchen staff started and around 5am, and there would be banging of bins and slamming of doors all day and evening. The rooms look tired, especially the bathrooms. They could do with a…

title: Wonderful location, friendly staff
review: I spent 9 nights here and enjoyed every minute of it.  The rooms are in need of updating, dirty wall paper older, chairs etc...but very clean. The staff was friendly and the pool area really pretty. The weekends they had a pool bar open with drinks and snacks and plenty of seating.  The location is close to beach and a great jumping off point for the costa blanca area.

title: Hit and miss
review: Got a great price on this hotel so was satisfied with our stay. It was only one night. The room was spacious, clean, had good air con and comfortable beds. It was very quiet.  We arrived late and they served us some food and wine in the restaurant. The food was very good, the wine was very bad. The service in the restaurant was appalling. It was like they just didn't know what to do. Offered no menus, offered no drinks, no water, table was badly laid, no offer to taste the wine and had to go to the bar to get more drinks. It was a good job the food was good. People on reception were great. Was a flying visit and for the price we paid, it was worth it. Customer service needs attention though.

title: Not nearly as bad as the reviews say....
review: Dear brinenick,  Thank you for your feedback. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We appreciate your nice comment regarding room cleanliness, air conditioning and bed.  However, we’re sorry we fell below your expectation regarding the restaurant service and the wine. We will address these concern. I assure you that the feedback of our hotel will be reviewed and most certainly forwarded to the appropriate departments.  We take  the confidence our guests place in us very seriously and work diligently to rectify any unsatisfactory experiences. We hope you give us a chance in the future to show you how great our hotel is.  Sincerely,  Orlando A. Case Manager IHGCare

title: Disappointing and poor customer service
review: Yes the hallway floors are in serious need of replacement, and apparently some of the rooms are not too great HOWEVER I had a pretty good experience here and I travel extensively.  When I arrived the staff were super nice and the reception area was immaculate.  I had a room on the 3rd floor and it was spotless and nicely furnished enough with nothing broken.  My son's room was also quite fine and we were VERY impressed with the daily maid service.  The rooms had a free safe.   What I did NOT like though was that the only 2 english channels were 24/7 news so I couldn't even watch a single movie or show ever.  This hotel has 24 hour room service which was limited but very nice.  The restaurant had GREAT food with reasonable prices and the bartenders and wait staff were superb. …

title: Far below IHG standards
review: Myself and my cousin stayed at the Holiday Inn from 26/05/2015 until 28/05/2015. We wanted a short getaway and were very shocked to find out that the swimming pool was closed for 'cleaning' for two whole days - 26/05/2015 and 27/05/2015. This meant we were only actually able to use the pool for half a day as we flew out on 28/05/2015 - early evening.  We could not understand how a pool can take two whole days to clean - particularly in May when you would expect the pool to be cleaned and ready for holidaymakers.  In addition, we had paid for bed and breakfast. On the first day - we were approached in the restaurant and told that breakfast was not included. Firstly, we would not have even bothered with breakfast if we had not paid for it - so to be embarrassed in front of others…

title: Needs updating
review: Just had 3 night 4 day stay here. We went with 3 other couples. We stayed here 2 years ago, so this was the reason we booked here again. Unfortunately the hotel could do with some refurbishment especially in the rooms. On arrival the staff were very helpful. We checked in then noticed the pool was closed for the 4 days we were there. I would just like to say, the area is very Spanish and the local resteraunts were very good. We go to the Alicante area every year with our group of friends, but we feel we will be giving the Holiday Inn a miss next year and try somewhere a bit more up to date.

title: Less than expected
review: Dear Mel A,  Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear that you liked the hotel location and helpful staff.  We work diligently to ensure our facilities are well maintained and we try our hardest to provide not just good value, but comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations. It seems that we were not able to execute an exemplary hotel stay experience this time due to the room conditions and pool closure. Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you. Your comments will be forwarded to the hotel management for consideration of future upgrades.    We know you have many choices when it comes to lodging and we hope you will continue to choose IHG for your travel needs.  Sincerely,   Lera P Case Manager  IHGCare

title: Good value hotel
review: Reception, restaurant and pool area was nice and fresh. My room felt less new and fresh. Toilet did not flush properly and the room itself was in need of refurbishing. Otherwise clean towels were provided and cleaning every day. I encountered four members of staff, where only two spoke good enough english for a place that receives international guests. The two who greeted me were friendly and tried their best, but my initial questions about the area and local transport yielded little results unfortunately. Wi-fi had old technology and poor coverage, and the last night it did not work at all.

title: Terrible.
review: Dear Blackfrozt,  Thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate your compliments with regards to our reception, restaurant and pool area. However, we’re sorry we fell below your expectation regarding the room condition and the WIFI connectivity was below average. We will address these concerns. I assure you that the feedback of our hotel will be reviewed and most certainly forwarded to the appropriate departments which will provide us an opportunity to correct ourselves and come up with better solution for you and other guests.  Again, thank you for your comments and we look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.   Sincerely,   Christian C Case Manager IHGCare

title: Once and never again - like Ryanair
review: Very kind and helpful staff. And you get a lot for the price you pay. Easy access to shops and beaches around. Would come back again.   Cons: This is not a facy hotel. It is quiet old. Still it is very clean.

title: Nice location and friendly staff
review: We stayed here for a family holiday, 4 kids and 6 adults. Breakfast was a large buffet and the rooms were also well proportioned. The staff on reception and in the bars were very good and friendly.  Unfortunately the decor in the rooms was old and in some cases chipped/broken/cracked but still usable.  The fold out bed was OK for the kids for a night or two but you wouldn't want to sleep there for a week.  Around the hotel there are a number of good restaurants and bars and the beach is a 10min walk.

title: Okay for short stay and would stay again
review: Nothing special, but very adequate. Wished we knew we could have taken the C6 bus from the airport and gotten off on the first stop! Nice breakfast was included in our booking and it was nice. About 15 minutes from airport.

title: Very good hotel for a short stay
review: Dear Goodtimehadbyall50,  Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us. We realize you have many choices when it comes to lodging, and we sincerely appreciate your business. We always strive to provide great service to all of our guests, and it is nice to read that the location of our property is up to your par. Your patronage and support to the hotel is very important to us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to ask the Manager on Duty.  Once again, thank you for staying with us and hope you will continue to choose IHG for your future travel needs.  Sincerely,  Divina P. Case Manager IHGCare

title: Good base for overnight in Alicante
review: We went to Alicante airport to pick up friends so we decided to stay the night at the holiday inn and we was very glad we did it was very good value nice big rooms and friendly staff all so a nice bar where you can  relax with a glass of wine or what ever you like and we had a very good meal in the restaurant

title: Good value
review: Arrived at the hotel at about 11pm to find friendly and cheerful receptionist. Rooms were a very good size with a range of pillows. Decor good and overall hotel looked well maintained. Breakfast is included with many booking sites so make sure you choose one of those! Breakfast was very good with a selection of traditional cold cuts, cheeses, fruit etc. regret toaster did not appear to be working. Relaxing breakfast overlooking the very sunny pool area.  Overall a very pleasant stay which was very peaceful and a hotel I would be happy to return to. Staff on check out equally cheerful and welcoming.

title: ideal for business
review: Although a little far off from Alicante CBD, its location is ideal as the beach is near and there are plenty of services nearby. Rooms are the right size for a business trip, clean and good service. I am  from Alicante and when I visit family or business this hotel is ideal.

title: Nice and comfortable
review: The hotel is good and not too far from the beach. Rooms are ok, clean and simple. I had the chance to eat dinner too, the service and quality of food is also good. Breakfast offers a lot of food. I would come back again if alone and in the area.

title: Four stars and one tiny soap for three guests
review: Dear Gianluca B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am glad that our location suited your needs and you found our breakfast options to be commendable. It is always a huge motivation on our end to receive commendable feedback from our valued guests like you.  Please see us soon if your travels bring you back to the area!  Best Regards,  Pam G Case Manager IHGCare

title: Run down hotel with serviceminded reception
review: The place proudly displays 4****, which, by looking at the room design, might have been the case ages ago. Nowadays, you get heavily scratched floors, old bathroom (with one tiny soap for three persons and two towel sets), antique TV-set, moving beds. The 3rd bed was an armchair bed, actually.   Size room ok, clean, friendly staff, and excellent breakfast buffet.

title: Less than expected
review: Dear tourism_revw,  Thank you for your feedback, both positive and constructive. It is lovely to hear you enjoyed breakfast and found the rooms clean and our staff friendly. We give the utmost importance to our guest comments as they help us improve, and continually provide the best guest experience possible. We are sorry our hotel did not live up to your expectations and regret you were not satisfied with the conditions of the room you received. While we understand that your stay was not 100% satisfactory, we would hope that you would give us another chance to make your stay as best as it can be.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

title: Ok'ish
review: We've just got back from a really lovely holiday in Playa de San Juan staying at the holiday Inn.  Weather was absolutely perfect and we loved the location, a ten minute walk to a fabulous beach resplendent with palm trees, walks to die for and cafes and restaurants along the beach.  Additionally, bus stop outside the hotel with regular, and cheap buses to Alicante.  Would definately stay in this area again.  Would I stay at the Holiday Inn ?  Probably, if they addressed a few issues.  Firstly, for a british tea drinker, a cup of tea first thing is essential to bring you into the land of the living.  It felt like a hardship not to have a kettle and tea and coffee in the bedroom, and I don't think I've stayed anywhere in years that doesn't supply this.  Secondly, the hotel needs…

title: Good location and great value
review: Dear Elaine S,  Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience and concerns. We work diligently to ensure our facilities are well maintained and we try our hardest to provide not just good value, but comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations. I am happy to hear you like our friendly staff and enjoyed the hotel pool. However, please accept my apologies for your less than satisfactory stay due to the condition of the room amenities encountered. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and trust that we will address the issues and assure you that proper measures will be taken   We do hope when business or pleasure brings you back to the area, you will allow us the opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Sincerely,  Zelyn N Case Manager IHGCare

title: Better than expected (after reading reviews)
review: I stayed here for 3 nights with my husband and little child in October.  For the price we paid I could not fault the hotel at all.  A short walk to the beach.  Lovely clean beach and lots of restaurants along the promenade.  The hotel pool was ice cold, but then it was October!  There was also a little play area for kids which was handy.

title: Poor quality/price relationship
review: Some days after booking our holiday in San Juan Alicante we read the reviews re the Holiday Inn..Both my husband and I are in our late retirement years... to say the least we were repulsed and devastated at the  accounts we read..and to be very frank they destroyed  and spoiled our "anticipatory" feeling ..We arrived at the hotel late Sat night Oct 4th.. only to be greeted at reception desk by a most courteous gentleman.Happy with our introduction etc we waited till daylight to assess things in more detail... All i can say is that we were VERY PLEASED .. Though not up to the quality of a 4* hotel ,the rooms were immaculately clean... the staff were helpful and friendly and the breakfast food was wholesome and plentiful.. The walk to the beautiful beach was Much Longer than we…

title: Shabby . HOLIDAY INN SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF THEMSELVES
review: Dear Catherine A,   Let me first thank you for choosing our hotel during your recent visit. It is a great pleasure to learn about your experience with us and to know that you were well looked after by our team and that you enjoyed our hotel facilities. I have taken note and wish to thank you for all your valuable comments. These are of great importance to us and allow us to monitor and improve our service continually.  Once again many thanks for your feedback and we would welcome the opportunity to serve you again.   Sincerely,   Karen C Case Manager IHGCare

title: In desperate need of renovation! Repeated requests ignored.
review: This hotel is in desperate need of a renovation. The rugs are filthy, stained, and smell of humidity and mould. Why they put carpeting in a beach hotel (in the heart of the ceramic tile industry) is beyond me. The hotel is independently owned and the owner is cheaping out on renovations. The reception summer staff is mostly young people who are not trained in hospitality, working as seasonal interns, for very little pay and there is no incentive for follow through.  I specifically asked for a FIRM mattress, in the booking details and BOTH mattresses on BOTH beds were flimsy and old. I put in a request with the reception to have something done, even a plywood board would have sufficed but our two requests were ignored. The sun chairs by the pool are the plastic hardware store…

title: Much better than I expected
review: Dear Lucas T,  First of all, thank you very much for your recent stay at our hotel. We give the utmost importance to our guest comments as they help us improve, and continually provide the best guest experience possible. It is unfortunate your stay was not as comfortable as it could have been due to the condition of the bed you received and maintenance levels on site being below par. We appreciate you bringing your concern to our attention. Please be assured that your comments will be used for the purpose of bringing improvements needed.   Again, thank you for the feedback and our apologies for the shortcomings.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

title: Well past it's best...
review: We chose this hotel, because we wanted a place relatively close to the beach. It cost us 3.85 euros per person to get a bus from the airport to Puerta Mar 1 (Plaza Puerta del Mar) and from the same bus stop we got into the bus 21 (it was somewhere around 3 euros per person I think) which went straight pass the Holiday Inn. Very easy and good air conditioning in the buses. When you want to go back, you just get into the bus from the other side of Holiday Inn (there is a small entrance which we used, when we would walk to the beach).  Based on the reviews I had read, I expected the place to be far shabbier than it was. Sure the carpets looked pretty stained (I would suggest them to change the fitted carpets into something that is easier to keep clean), but otherwise everything was…

title: This hotel needs a complete renovation
review: Dear Joanna-Finland,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review regarding your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apologies for falling short of your expectations, specifically with the issues you have had with the noise. Rest assured that these issues will be looked into. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas and take the necessary actions to ensure similar situations can be avoided in the future. We appreciate the candid feedback we receive and welcome any opportunity to improve.  Sincerely,  Karen G.  Case Manager IHGCare

title: Spoilt by mismanagement
review: Hotel lobby is very welcoming and modern. Rooms and corridors are worn and old fashioned. Our room was very large with good air conditioning. Breakfast service was chaotic with dis-interested staff and many uncleared tables, no napkins or cutlery available. However there was a good selection of fresh fruit and pastries. Our reservation was made on a best available rate basis although the hotel still decided to apply a one night charge a week in advance of our arrival and also requested full payment for the week when we checked in. Pool area is clean and the poolside bar serves a good selection of drinks and snacks. Hotel's location is very convenient for buses to Alicante and within walking distance of the beach and a good selection of restaurants.  Wifi is advertised at the…

title: Good Hotel...but renew those filthy carpets!!
review: As a Priority Platinum member I have raved about this hotel before as I have visited it every year for the last 8 yrs., and this trip in July was just as good.. socially.  HOWEVER for the last five years the corridor carpets need renewing as they are stained and STINK!  I am not the first to moan about the state of the carpets as many have stated before me. This year we noticed that some parts of the hotel are getting a bit tired from the lack of close up maintenance, and don't get me started on those stupid plastic sun loungers!  Note: Free Wi-Fi can be a little patchy at times.  To the owner of this franchise: lets see a bit of money spent on your investment and get it back to some of its finer days.

title: on the downhill
review: Dear Alicanteman,  Thank you for your feedback of our hotel. We strive to provide the best possible service and experience and it is always great to hear from our guests on how we are doing. I am deeply sorry that on this day we were not able to meet your expectations especially with the condition of the carpets and hotel amenities received. Your comments will be forwarded to the ownership of the hotel to take into consideration for future upgrades.   We value you as an IHG Rewards Club Platinum member and we hope to have an opportunity to show you how great our hotel is.  Sincerely,  Zelyn N Case Manager IHGCare

title: Great value, good location
review: First of all, I have to say that I like this hotel. It's very convenient for a stay at San Juan playa and I personally prefer it to any of the hotels located right on the beach because it makes the hotel more calm and less party oriented. It also gives you the opportunity to have a little walk before getting to the beach (it's about 300m so really perfect in my opinion). The hotel also has a nice pool if you prefer the pool to going to the beach and the staff is usually very nice and helpful. It also has a little gym and paddel courts if you feel like keeping active. All this to say that I've stayed in this hotel about 6 or 7 times in the last 7 years and I'll probably be back. However... and it's a big however, there's no denying that since my 1st visit to this hotel (I…

title: Ok if your Spanish, please read.
review: Dear mark1977Montreal,  Thank you for leaving a comprehensive review, highlighting not only the bad but also the good points of your stay. Your willingness to spare some of your time to relay your comments is genuinely appreciated. It is lovely to hear that our location suited your needs.   It is certainly not our intent to inconvenience our valued customers, but to instead provide good value, comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations. Your feedback is of great importance to us and allows us to monitor and improve our product and service continually.  Thank you again for your comments. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

title: Change not Good
review: Can only echo much that has been said before, a good value hotel based in a good location for exploring the area.  I would rate the beach at San Juan as the finest I have visited in Europe in terms of space and cleanliness, We traveled to Benidorm for the day and really appreciated the contrast when we returned.  Couple of practical points regarding traveling from the airport - take Bus C6 to Alicante Port (Puerto del Mar) then change to Bus 21 which stops outside the hotel, cost is around £5 in total one way and will take about an hour.  The return bus route to Alicante leaves from the road behind the hotel and runs every 20 minutes.  I can recommend the tram system also, the nearest station to Alicante is just up the hill Hollande or Av. Naciones, you can pay cash on board and…

title: Excellent hotel and value
review: Booked up for a last minute week abroad, found this hotel on trip advisor. Great hotel, 5 minutes walk to the beach at San Juan about 6km's from Alicante. Room spotless, food in hotel great. Staff brilliant. Pool spotless, certainly caters for families as well. It is one hotel I would certainly go back to out of this world

title: Dangerous Sunbeds!
review: This is the second time my wife and I have stayed here. Rooms are clean spacious but tired. Having said that for the price it is great value. Well serviced by Trams and Buses, a short walk to the beach and Playa de San Juan central. Don't expect international cuisine its all very Spanish. The sunbeds around the pool have a habit of collapsing. this can be quite hilarious when watching newcomers! However the are old and dangerous, the girl at reception assured me that they were being replaced shortly (trouble is they said that last year too).  Overall for the money cant beat it.

title: Excellent Stay
review: Stayed 11 nights here 27th April to 8th May on bed and breakfast. Well situated for the brilliant beach of Playa San Juan and plenty of restaurants/shops within walking distance. Good size rooms kept clean by friendly maid service, friendly and helpful reception desk and good value hot buffet breakfast and bar prices as good as local bars. The hot part of the breakfast needs to be monitored a little better,If there was no eggs or bacon left it was a 20 minute wait for fresh. Thank you for a lovely stay.

title: Good value
review: We checked in on 22/05 after leaving another hotel due to bad location and no pool. When we arrived the receptionist was very friendly and helpful, our room was spacious and clean. The pool area was small but clean and ideal for my 7 yr old. We paid for b&b and we were very pleased with the breakfast it includes egg, bacon, fruit, cereal,pastries and more. When we asked about a fridge the receptionist arranged for the mini bar to be emptied so we could use the fridge. The beach is 10 min walk max and is a lovely beach, there's a supermarket 5 mins away, more shops and restaurants 5 mins away. Overall for the money we paid no complaints.

title: Great week, good budget hotel.
review: Most staff we friendly, (the new girl was lovely) and what I expected, the rooms are quite large and value for money, the only reason we have not given a 5 was because the room still smelt of Cigarette Smoke when checking in and is not normal holiday inn standards. Great sun trap outside with lovely palm tree decoration. Will stay again.

title: Friendly and good value for the money
review: I spent two nights here in Nov 2013. The hotel is clean, friendly and well-priced. I took my meals in the hotel restaurant and while the food was just okay, the prices were good, the portions ample and the service always pleasant. For anyone traveling to Alicante on business or for a beach break (the beach is an easy 10 minute walk), consider this hotel. The only really obvious flaw I saw was hallway carpeting that desperately needs replaced - fortunately the rooms were much nicer than the hallways.

title: Pleasantly surprised !!!!
review: Lovely hotel, clean, good breakfast, friendly staff and great value for money. We are just back from staying there for a week over the Christmas and New Year period. From beginning to end, we really enjoyed our stay. We are regular visitors to Alicante and we have stayed in many other hotels around the area, however value for money, this is the best hotel we have stayed in and we will return. Very nice little bar area for coffee in the morning or a drink in the evening. Less than a 10 minute walk to the beach, which is just perfect. Nice pool area and padel courts.

title: very helpful, pleasant staff & great location near beach
review: Stayed in this hotel over the New Year period & no complaints as such! Read reviews of hotel prior to booking & although they were quite negative, we were prepared to take the risk being major Holiday Inn users! We were not disappointed - the hotel is in a very good location near the beach & easy to get to from the airport by public transport. The staff are all very helpful, pleasant and can only praise them for their attitude. Reviewers have said that the hotel is tired and yes, it is a bit, but nothing to complain about and everywhere, including the pool area is kept clean & tidy - just don't go expecting an up-market hotel. The food is adequate but wouldn't necessarily use it for meals as there are plenty of nearby eateries within walking distance offering a more Spanish…

title: Very below average but very few choices in San Juan.
review: We've stayed here a couple of times for a couple of key reasons--although it definitely has it's downsides. The "value" is the best in San Juan for a hotel with its amenities. Kids stay/eat free, parking is secure, decent kids program and various size of swimming pools are definite bonus. However hotel is in need of a MAJOR overhaul and renovation. Mattresses are old and squeaky. Noelia (manager) argued with me consistently that the room we had two years previously did not exist. She even told me she knows the hotel like her DNI! Red wine was served COLD at dinner. Fries served COLD. Given volume of guests in August, wait staff/ kitchen's priority are guests on full and half board. The hotel's proximity to Alicante, the beach, and the bus/tran are positives but it's wrinkles are…

title: Staff let down by tired and worn out rooms and corridors
review: Dear Lucas T,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay. It is unfortunate the accommodations received prevented you from fully enjoying your time at the hotel. We take all of the reviews we receive very seriously as they allow us to identify areas that may benefit from additional attention. We have shared your comments with the staff and we’re confident the necessary adjustments will be made, in order to achieve complete guest satisfaction.   Thank you again for your comments, we hope to have the pleasure of serving you again soon.   Sincerely,   Adrian D Case Manager IHGCare

title: Impossible to find, well almost!
review: Good grief! We left the airport in our hire car, thank goodness it was A. Full of fuel and B. v economical! What should have been a twenty minute journey took nearly an hour. The map provided on the Internet by the hotel must have been designed by someone who should have paid attention during their geography lessons. Apart from the drawing of the car park there was little resemblance between the map and reality! Most cities in Europe have sign posts specifically for pointing the weary traveller towards their chosen place of ret. well there is ..... One! And then nothing! Also some bright spark had decided that street names were a thing of the past so if you are psychic...no probs but if you are like us ... No hope!  Having eventually found the hotel you will be impressed by the…

title: Good staff, poor maintenance
review: Dear Falcoflyer,  Thank you for taking the time to express your thoughts and concerns. It is nice to know that our rooms were sufficient for your needs. However, please accept our apologies if this visit was not 100% satisfactory due to the soundproofing conditions and if you had trouble finding our location. We appreciate your feedback as this is our best resource for improving guest services.   We would welcome the opportunity to serve you again and make your stay as best as it can be.  Sincerely,  Pam G Case Manager IHGCare

title: Average - nothing special at all
review: Comfortable, nice stay, friendly staff. The hotel needs minor maintenance that would make a world of difference... old paint, wore out sofas, humidity stains, etc... although we had a few issues they were all taken care of by front desk.  Ok breakfast for the price.

title: Different views
review: Dear Pukinano,  Many thanks for your feedback. It is pleasant to know you like our friendly staff. We strive to provide the best possible service and experience and it is always great to hear from our guests on how we are doing. I am sorry for any discomfort you may have experienced due to the condition of the hotel. Your comments about the property needing refurbishments will be forwarded to the ownership of the hotel to take into consideration for future upgrades.  Again, thank you for your suggestions.  Sincerely,  Zelyn N Case Manager IHGCare

title: Nice, Comfortable Stay
review: We stayed here for one night in September en route to our holiday home and planned to explore Alicante for a couple of days.  It had a large free car park which was very handy for us, but the location was far outside of the main attractions of Alicante, our fault for not doing our homework properly, but tapas and drinks in the Old Town necessitated a cab ride (20 euro return) okay for one night but pricey for more.   I would disagree that this would be a business hotel, it is not to the standard one expects (and usually receives in UK and USA for example) from a Holiday Inn hotel.  Not a square metre of carpet in the corridors was without ominous stains, it smelt "funky" and all the doors were scratched. The room was okay but very tired, where the sconces for the wall lights…

title: Superb long weekend!
review: Absolutely terrific long weekend away made all the better by this cracking hotel! Staff polite and knowledgeable, room spotless, pool area like a new pin! We cannot fault this hotel!!  The only slight negative we had was some noisy departing guest at 530am who was not a kid (!) who obviously found it funny to be talking very loudly as he walked down the corridors!

title: life saver
review: Having been on holiday in Spain for 2 weeks, we arrived at Alicante airport a day early.We found the hotel quiet easy to find,( only 3 km from airport ).The staff as usual were very friendly and spoke good English.Check out time was 1100 am,i have a priority club card which allows us to a late check out.The room had air con which was very helpful,it was hot.We stayed on 30/09/2013 the local beach was very good if you had the right clothes ????.We would recommend this hotel .The price was 45 euro good value.

title: Difficult to find.....
review: First of all, you have to actually find it. This hotel is incredibly difficult to find, and Google map is not entirely accurate. The roads are "one way" in this area and they're are not signposted - (rare ones that are, normally have the sign hidden under tree branches and foliage!) This also meant that when we ventured out, we found it nigh on impossible to find the hotel again.  The hotel map is virtually useless, not accurate and the area that the hotel is in is not even on the main map! (A lot of the map was covered in ads, making it difficult to make sense of).  The hotel itself is nestled between high rise apartment blocks. Opposite the hotel is an absolutely massive block that sweeps around in a gentle curve for what looks like about a quarter of a mile. It is a complete…

title: Lovely hotel, location not ideal tho!!
review: Stayed 5 nights on a mixture of paid stay and points. The hotel is situated in a residential area about 10 mins from the lovely beach. The rooms are tired but fit for purpose, the only thing I missed was a balcony to sit out on, don't know if they have any rooms with them, didn't see any.. There is no kettle, but we took our travel kettle and had a couple of cups from the restaurant. The pool area is nice, from previous reviews it appears that they have replaced the sun beds as we didn't have any problems with them.

title: lovely quite area
review: small hotel in a quite residential area , but 10 mins from a most beautifull beach , shops and bars , the hotel was very comfortable and clean  the linen was changed daily, most of the staff were very friendly and helpful  especially the reception and the two guys in the bar / restaraunt dominic and christian but if the lady with long black hair and glasses was on duty forget being served as she will ignore you and was very rude . we enjoyed our stay the pool was lovely not too deep and it was very peacefull no rowdy bars in the area but still a bit of night life

title: ideal for short break
review: had a thoroughly enjoyable 3 night stay here experiencing none of the problems of some previous reviewers. our room had a safe,air con,toiletries and daily towel change. hotel is situated in a residential area,10 -15 minute stroll from gorgeous beach. the resort itself is mainly Spanish,with very little English spoken or understood so would suggest swatting up on a few phrases and menu items as it would make for a more enjoyable break.

title: Would have been great except money was stolen from our room!
review: We spent the week from 16-20 Sep 2013 at the Holiday Inn. Decent location. We checked in and went up to our room to unwind and go about out our vacation. We paid the extra money for the breakfast, which was ok. They had a kid table with plastic plates and plastic kiddie cups with nesquick packets and straws but no kids plastic ware, which would have been useful for our two yr old. We had our room cleaned everyday, of course with two little kids it becomes a bit disturbed. The beds were ok, they had firm and soft pillows for preference. We had absolutely no shower gel/shampoo in the bathroom dispenser upon check in, and only one towel for all four of us to share. And as most of us know, after a long day of traveling its nice to take a shower once you arrive in your room. The…

title: A dated 3 star and nothing more
review: Dear sjdj82,  Thank you for your review regarding your recent stay at the Holiday Inn Alicante Playa De San Juan, Spain. I would like to address this with you further. I have sent you a private message to obtain more information about your stay. I look forward to hearing from you and being of further assistance.  Sincerely,  Dhan M Case Manager IHGCare

title: Another great stay - Can't wait to come back!!!
review: Holiday Inn what are you doing in Spain with this hotel, it's poor. Booked as UK ones are very good and I use you often. Arrived 19th Sept for 3 days and given a twin room which stunk of smoke, booked a double room all non smoking. Rusty bath, wallpaper coming off the wall,  2 large holes in the net curtain and as previous user  reports air con is on last legs. We asked reception to find another room only to be told on the 3rd occasion we are full. We offered to go to another hotel and were told no refund as we had booked advance super saver. I reminded them that they were in breach of contract on their side, still no luck even though we had booked on the Holiday Inn web site.  Went to the swimming pool to cool off and guess what the loungers do collapse, twice in one hour,…

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Just spent a week here with 2 other adults.  It's  a nice clean hotel with basic facilities, which suited our needs.  They have a pool which is 1.3m deep - great for me as I don't like it when I'm out of my depth.  Plenty of sun loungers and umbrellas for shade - some of the loungers collapse unexpectedly - amusing the first once or twice but tiresome after that.  Some of the loungers have arms - these ones are more stable.  The life guard, who is on duty every day, spends time with the children playing games in the pool and helping the nervous ones relax. There are a variety of floats and even a floating basket ball net and goalposts which were used by adults also for a bit of fun.   The room was clean and comfortable however there were no tea/coffee facilities in room :( .  …

title: Guest "please can I have a glass of water?" Waitress "NO"
review: I stayed here as a family of 11, 6 adults and 5 children at the end of August.  The customer service was extremely bad and this is just an example of when I asked the lady in the bar/restaurant for a glass of water as the bar pool had been closed for over 20 minutes: Me "please can I have a small glass of water"?  Waitress "no go outside to the pool bar"  Me "its been closed for 20 minutes, please can I just have a small glass of water"  Waitress "No it hasn't been closed, go outside" Me "please just a small glass of water, that is all I want" Waitress "No" Me in reception "the waitress refused to give me a glass of water" Receptionist "she probably misunderstood you"  Now I'm no travel critic but to me, that just bad customer service.  There were a few other incidents with…

title: Terrible Hotel!!!
review: We just got back from A week stay at Holiday in San Juan. After reading various reviews, we were very pleasantly surprised. The rooms Are clean and light, good space and Nice beds and AC. The pool areas Are great, my daughter spent full days in That pool and loved it. The sunbeds does collapse, but there is always available space. Beautiful beach and restaurants, supermarkets and all That You need close by and walking distance. The very best is the athmosphere in the hotel. The friendly, including and relaxed feeling from an excellent staff. They Are like A big family, always smiling doing what they can and more, for their guests. We will definetely come back to this hotel. V

title: Nice Hotel
review: This hotel is just awful!! Dirty, terrible service, and needs to be majorly updated. I booked this for a weekend stay with my wife and daughters so we ended up booking two rooms. Dont let the photos on their website fool you. The lobby is nice but any other area and rooms/bathrooms are horrible. We had the sink blocked from the first night and when we asked the receptionist to get someone to fix the problem, we were told that there was no one to work on the problem since it was after 9PM and all rooms were taken and we had to use the bath tub instead! I could not wait to leave this place in the morning. I will never stay here again! Only good thing about this place is the close location to the beach.

title: Basic, Holiday Inn. Ok, pool area.
review: Just visited this hotel with our 4 person family. Our visit was just a one night stay and for that purpose hotel was ok. The nice beach of San Juan is a 5 min walk, but if you want to experience Alicante city choose somtehing more centrally located. Room was big and basic family room with good aircon. Do not expect any luxyry here.

title: Great location but could do with modernisation!

We are very pleased to note that you were satisfied with the facilities and services that we have to offer. Your satisfaction is of utmost importance to us as we constantly strive to make your experience a pleasant one.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to write to us. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you in the future.  Sincerely,   Dhan M Case Manager  IHGCare

title: Recent visit to Alicante
review: We have just returned from 7 nights at Holiday Inn Playa San Juan. We booked it because we'd been told it was close to the beach and all we wanted was a cheap week away in the Spanish sunshine. We also got a good rate for room only so that was great.  From Alicante airport it's really easy to get to the hotel by public transport - we got the bus from the airport and then the TRAM from the centre of Alicante. It it really cheap (about 3EUR each) and doesn't take too long at all. We had to do a bit of a diversion because it was the Spanish celebrations week, otherwise it probably would have been even quicker! From the TRAM stop in Playa San Juan it's about a 5 minute walk to the hotel and you can see where it is as soon as you get off the TRAM.  On arrival at the hotel, we were…

I'm very sorry you were not satisfied with the condition of our hotel and it's amenities. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas. We welcome any opportunity to improve.   If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to ask the Manager on Duty.   Sincerely,  Ferdinand G Case Manager IHGCare

title: GOOD FOR A SHORT BREAK
review: Sun loungers collapsed many times and our room smelt of smoke as did some of the bedding but they were the only negatives about our stay. Clean and bright hotel, lovely pool area with plenty of sunloungers. Really close to the beautiful beach and tram to Alicante and Benidorm where we visited. Food in the restaurant was beautiful, up with the best we ate on our holiday. Wi Fi quite poor but access to a computer for free in the hotel was a great bonus for planning day trips.

title: RECENT STAY
review: We have stayed at this hotel before, it was again very nice to stay there the room was clean and the Staff were very friendly and helpful, We also had dinner in the restaurant which was very nice and a reasonable price.

title: Clean comfortable and friendly hotel
review: Our second visit to this hotel and pleased with the standards of the hotel. Room well decorated and very clean with good daily maid service. Nice breakfast and a good choice to suit all palates including lots of fresh fruit. Hotel situated in a residetial area close to a fantastic beach and close to a good range of local shops bars and restaurants. Small pool and sun terrace although watch out for the sun beds as they tend to collapse. Only small niggle is no courtesy tray in the room although there is a well stocked mini bar not too expensive. Free fast wifi and free use of a computer. Good value in a lovely quiet part of Alicante.Some Basic spanish useful in the hotel and local area. Excellent bus and tram service. Stay in Alicante if you want the nightlife, stay in San Juan…

title: Excellent value for money
review: My friend and I have just returned from a 5 day stay here and we were most pleasantly surprised after reading a bag of mixed reviews on here.  We arrived at Alicante mid morning and quickly cleared customs, (DO NOT waste your money on the expensive taxi ride approx €40 each way.) we headed outside where we bravely boarded public transport, there is a airport to Alicante transfer bus at the cost of €2.90 each in to the centre of alicante, we got off the bus at the central train station in the centre, this journey takes approx 25/30 mins.  We then crossed the road and got the number 21 bus to the holiday inn San juan at the cost of €1.45 this takes approx 25 min's but takes you right outside the hotel. Brilliant bus service at the fraction of the cost of a taxi!  When we arrived…

title: Nice hotel, but could be improved
review: I had visited this hotel a few times in the past and it's a very convenient hotel for the San Juan beach. The hotel itself is nice with large rooms featuring safes and a good selection of tv channels. The bathroom is big with everything you need. However the rooms have a few little flaws. The beds are set up on wheels, which is practical for some things but even when blocked the beds still move around a little. The tvs are still those old style Cathode Ray Tube TVS which I think in 2013 is unacceptable for a 4 star hotel in a developed country. Now, the hotel is overall very nice with a nice pool outside, a little gym and padel courts in the back. The parking area is fine although fills up on weekends. The WIFI finally worked decently this time (in my last visits it was really…

title: A return to one of our favourite places to stay!
review: We had a good  four night stay in April at the Holiday Inn. It's well situated about a 10 minute walk  down to  the beach through a nice area which is relaxing and calm. The staff are always pleasant, helpful and welcoming and our room was spotlessly clean with a comfortable bed and separate bathroom. The bar and restaurant were really useful serving a well priced tasty menu. The pool and surrounding area is lovely ideal for sunbathing and swimming and extremely well maintained. Overall a great break at this very competitively priced hotel.

title: Good hotel for the beach
review: We visited this hotel for the first time in May 2013 and stayed for 8 nights. We had never stayed so close to Alicante before or in that area of the Costa Blanca. We were pleasantly surprised that the hotel was so quiet. To be honest we did not use any of the the facilities apart for a couple of drinks from the bar, prefering to go out for breakfast and meals. The room on the 5th floor was large and very clean, aircon worked very well and plenty of space for clothes etc. Full marks for the housekeeping staff, they were excellent!  This is a very good base to  travel from - start the day with a walk along the spotless promemade to one of the purpose built cafe/restuarants (Niza is the nearest and very friendly). Unlike some Spanish resorts very little English is spoken so prepare…

title: Value for money
review: Stayed at this hotel in early May for 4 days. Its in quite a residential area, although there are a few bars and restaurants about five minutes walk away. There is a lovely quite (at least when we were there) beach very close by. The rooms were clean and modest. We were not expecting much at the price we paid, (160euro for the 4 nights) but were pleasantly surprized. Good sized bedroom and bathroom, with lovely big bath sheets, as opposed to the small ones usually supplied! The room did smell a little of smoke and when I pointed this out, they did offer to move us. We did not bother, as we both smoke anyway. They are quite short staffed, especially in the bar and restaurant, but Domingo did a fantastic job. The bar prices were very reasonable, as was the somewhat limited…

title: Value for money
review: Excellent location close to the beaches, very comfortable and clean. The breakfast buffet is first class, as are the facilities. For travelers arriving by train, the tram station is only 100m away and the Cabo Huertas stop is very close to the hotel.

title: Good location and kids entertainment.
review: This may be the third time we came to this hotel. Nice in general. Great service. Awesome kids entertainment. Though, this time we noted some lack of maintenance in our room: missing bulbs, some lights switches not working,...

title: Thin walls and noisy...but
review: I stayed here for one night Easter weekend, which would probably explain why it was so noisy as the Spanish do like to celebrate Easter.  The walls are paper thin which means that you hear everything (and I mean everything - all that celebrating :)) from the adjoining rooms and the hallways.  I ate in the restaurant as I didn't arrive until late, it was OK - I'm a very picky eater - but nothing special.  Had I of had time I would have gone elsewhere anyway. It is a very long way from the airport.  I had to get two buses - one was the airport bus, and then another local bus.  Fortunately I got talking to a few locals returning from holiday and took advice from them.  I did get a taxi to the airport the next morning for speed more than anything else, but would have been happy to…
